1152.content:
"C'mon, c'mon! Whack 'em to bits!"

This comment came from the fattest girl in Lomer High School, Erika. She was sitting at home, in her couch, with a gamecube controller connected to her Nintendo Wii. She was playing one of the more strategic games ever concived, Pikmin 2.
Now, she was commanding a bunch of Pikmin against a boss - a snake-like creature with the head of a bird.

"C'mon, Purple! Do that sumo-stomp! Smack it!", Erika cheered as her little Pikmin army attacked. From the hallway, one of her older brothers, Joe, came into the room. He was in his pj's, and looked half-asleep. He looked at his "big" sister, and noticed she was in HER jammies, which were naturally tighter on her large frame. "Erika, what are you doing? It's the middle of the night!", her brother said, rubbing his eyes.

Erika paused her game, and turned to her brother. Even though she was the fattest in her school, she had one of the most beautiful faces of anybody. She brushed aside some of her hair, and replied, "If you had bothered to look at the clock, Joe, you would know that in this world, it's actually 4:30."
Joe blinked, and checked the clock; she was right. "Oh, sorry. I guess I'm still half-asleep."
"It's ok," she said. "You have an excuse, considering how late you stayed up."

She resumed her battle; the snake-bird shook off the Pikmin and burrowed underground. Joe watched his sister battle. "How come you're so into this game?", he asked. "I thought you'd be more into Halo and stuff."
"Just because I'm playing one game doesn't mean it's my new favorite, Joe," she answered, not taking her eyes off the TV screen. "But to answer your question, what's not to like? You play as an alien, you meet and fight all these cool animals - like the Snagret I'm gonna beat -, and you control an army of small, colorful, singing walking plant-minions. It's a dream come true!"
Joe chuckled. "Well, don't get too sucked in; remember you have school."
Erika paused. "Oh my gosh, you sounded just like mom for a second."
They both laughed.

Now before we continue, one quick question. Do Erika and her brothers still live with their parents, or does she live in her brothers house?
1152.title: Erika, slayer of Snagrets

She only wore a bikini and even now she was sweating.

"Men i'm so boooored."

"That's noting for you Katie. Normal you're so active." Her mother said.

Katie looked like a smaller younger version of her mother. It was strange that she had't anything in looks compared with her dad. He always liked it to train with her and do things with her. Her mother wore big sunglasses and a big hat that gave her some shade.

"You could call a friend." Her mother suggested.

"They are all on vacation. Why can't we go too?"

"Katie stop whining! We can't go away every vacation. Besides we went on vacation many times."

"Yeah. When i was 0, 1, 2 and 3. I remember so much of that." She said snappish but soft.

"Of course." Katie said with a smile.

Katie was very nice and polite and had many friends and also easily made friends. So maybe she could make a new friend.
She walked too the garage.

"What are you going too do?" Her mother asked.

"Open the hose too cool off. Could't you buy a swimming pool?"

"Do you know how much that cost and how much work it is?"

Katie walked over too the garage.

A half hour later Katie heard a car coming. She excited waited what kind of girl it was. First a chubby tall woman came out with blond hair also with big sunglasses and blond hair.
Behind her came a girl about Katie's age. She was fat. She had white hair that fall around a fat face. She had flabby arms and a big potbelly that stuck out forward with rubbing thighs. She smiled friendly.
Katie polite introduce herself, but seeing this girl... she doubted this girl did much activity. But still at least someone to hang out with.

"Hello you must be Katie. I'm Salie Marsh and this is my daughter Caroline."

Caroline friendly stuck out her hand. Katie shook it.

"You two go play." Katie's mother said.

"Come on!" Katie said and ran into the garden.

After a while she stopped so Caroline could catch up with her.Caroline was kind of slow. She was breathing heavily when she finally reached her.

123.content:
“Harry!" said Fred, elbowing Percy out of the way and bowing deeply. "Simply splendid to see you, old boy-"
"Marvelous," said George, pushing Fred aside and seizing Harry's hand in turn. "Absolutely spiffing."
Percy scowled.
"That's enough, now," said Mrs. Weasley.
"Mum!" said Fred as though he'd only just spotted her and seizing her hand too. "How really corking to see you-”

"Hey, you fat pig!"

Nina pulled herself away from the blissful serenity of her book, glancing up to meet whoever had interrupted her reading.
Before her stood two of the class's most annoying people. First stood Sandrina, the class princess and self-proclaimed prettiest girl in the school. She had a frown which would easily have earned her a time-out form any mother, which was framed by her neck-length shiny black hair. She had her hands on her hips, showcasing her slim frame underneath her expensive-looking clothes.
Behind her stood Hannah, a stuck-up blonde-haired girl whose personality could be best summed up with the words "pet parrot".

"Hello Sandrina," Nina greeted with absolute disinterest. "To what do I owe the pleasure?"

"How can you stand being so fat?"

The plump child resisted the urge to shoot a comeback, and resumed reading in her bean bag chair. 'Just ignore them, Nina, she reminded herself. 'If you fight, they'll only push back harder.'
Sandrina pouted, frustrated in her efforts to tease the fatty before her. Feeling ignored, she opted a different approach...

"What are you reading there?", the snobby girl asked, obviously probing for weaknesses.

Nina presented the cover to them, eyeing the two expectantly. "See for yourself," she beckoned.
At that moment, Sandra and Hannah froze; they had forgotten, Nina was the only person in the class who could read fluently. Sandrina steeled herself, ready to meet the challenge.

"Harry... Potter... and the... pri-zon-er... of.. Azaband."

Nina tried very hard not to laugh. "Try again."

"...Prisoner of...Abbakand," Hannah tried.

Nina snorted, obviously trying her hardest to not giggle aloud. Sandrina noticed, and put on the defensive. "What's so funny?!," she angrily protested.

"Az-ka-ban," Nina enunciated for them. "Prisoner of Azkaban."

"Who cares about the stupid book, anyway!?", Sandrina replied with a huff. She turned away and stormed off walked away, Hannah close on her

"Sure, because I'm apparently the only one who can read them," Nina answered quietly out of earshot. She sighed, and cracked open the book to where she had left off. Before she resumed, however, her mind flashed back to a single quote...

'...you fat pig...', she thought to herself. The thought of it made her smile and giggle to herself. What the local bullies hadn't quite caught on was that their teasing Nina about her weight only had the opposite effect of what they'd intended. She actually rather liked their attempts at insults and name-calling. She wasn't quite sure why, but...it made her feel happy, being called out for being the fatty she was.

With a pleasant smile, she reached her hand in her bag for a chocolate bar. At that same moment, she felt her clothes tighten, and heard a soft "pop". A button of her blouse popped off and landed in the book sitting right on her knees. She blushed slightly, not expecting to pop a button so soon. She sat up, and saw some of her fat belly already poking out of the blouse.
"Well, there goes the first one," she said with a giggle, feeling terribly excited about her growth. Her blouse already felt tight, and she suspected it wouldn't take long before she popped another.

She grabbed the chocolate, and quickly stuffed the whole bar in her mouth like a pig, chewing it a few times before gulping it down. She licked her lips as her thoughts turned towards dinner; her father had promised that they would be having more fried chicken tonight, and her father always kept his promises.
Both her parents knew that their daughter liked being big and stuffing her face, and although her father was somewhat more open-minded about it, her mother had taken quite a lot of arguing to to accept her daughter's wishes.
That being said, just because she accepted it didn't mean her mother was entirely happy with Nina's choice-

The ringing of the bell snapped Nina out of her thoughts, and brought her back to the present. It was time for class. Following her claassmates, she entered the classroom and took her seat behind her desk in the front row.
"All right class," the teacher announced, "we have reading practice today!" This brought out moans from everyone, Sandrina and Hannah among them. Nina, on the other hand, smiled happily. Taking note to cover up her popped button as best she could, lest the teacher spotted it, she pulled out her pencil and prepared for the day.
123.title: The prisoner of Azkaban

choices: The kids come inside from recess; the schoolday continues
Mrs. McCoy comes inside to tell Nina something
One of the kids comes inside to try and tease Nina
1231.content:
The lesson continued on as usual - Nina aced every problem presented to her, and Sandrina and Hannah struggling to get past the first words.
At 9:00, however, the bell rang, and all the children grew excited. They knew what it meant - at last, it was time.....for recess. Everyone dropped what they were doing and raced outside to the playground.

Everyone, that is, except for Nina.

Mrs. McCoy looked at her star pupil, as Nina retreated to the reading area. The reading corner was situated in the corner of the classroom. Two bookcases were used as makeshift walls, with enough space between them like a doorway for anyone entering. Due to the corner's relatively small area, there were no normal chairs in the corner. Instead, bean bag chairs were used, to offer the kids a place to relax as they read.
It was Nina's favorite place in the school.

She smiled, unable to resist an iota of pride - already at age 6, and she was reading full-length novels! Mrs. McCoy watched as the fat little girl flopped into the bean bag chair, unwrapping another chocolate bar. She also knew about Nina's desire to get bigger, although she wasn't as angry or scared as Nina's mother was when she first heard.

"Hey, Nina? Aren't you coming outside?", Mrs. McCoy asked her cheerfully.

"No thank you," Nina replied, looking up from her book. "I'd rather stay in here and read, if that's ok, ma'am."

"That's perfectly fine, Nina," Mrs. McCoy replied, " but be careful not to get chocolate all over those pages now. It's important to take care of books."

Nina nodded; "Don't worry, there's a cover on just in case!"

Her teacher smiled, and went outside to watch all the other children. She didn't have to worry about Nina; were it not for the school lessons, she'd be sitting there for hours reading.
Nina placed her chocolate bar on a nearby paper plate, and sat up more on her bean bag, grateful for their existence. She stretched her arms up, making her shirt ride up and exposing the bottom of her belly. Then she leaned back into the chair, and resumed reading while devouring her chocolate.
1231.title: Recess

12311.content:
After the last bite of chocolate disappeared down her throat, Nina took note of how tight her blouse felt, and how the buttons began to dig into her. Maybe it would behoove her to wait until she was home to eat, she contemplated. She knew her mother didn't liked it when her clothes ripped or lost buttons.

"First thing I'll do when i get home is pull off this blouse, grab a big bowl of snacks and a big glass of cola, and continue reading."

She slid deeper into her bean bag chair, and lost herself in the pages of the book until she heard the school bell. She sighed somewhat sadly, slid a makeshift paper bookmark where she stopped in the book, and waddled back to her seat.
Soon the other kids returned to the classroom. Mrs. McCoy followed behind, smiling warmly as she caught Nina taking care of the books as she put them up.
"Teacher's pet," Hannah whispered as she passed by Nina, prompting a frown from Nina as the class returned to their seats.

Nina returned her gaze to the board, focusing on the lessons. She was fairly good in most subjects, save for physical education. Even without Nina's will to grow bigger and her already portly size, she'd never really been one for physical activity. It seemed a waste of effort, to her; she was always exhausted by the end of it, and she knew she would probably fail most P.E. activities. Fortunately for her, all her other grades were good, so she felt she could skip fussing over one class.

Nina was pulled from her focus by a painful pinch on the back of her neck. She looked at the ground, and found a small rubber band. Looking over her shoulder revealed the source of the disturbance – Hannah, with a sly grin her face. Her grin quickly turned to fear, though, as she found herself under the teacher's gaze. Several minutes later, Hannah was sitting in the hallway outside the classroom, while the lesson went on.

The rest of the day was mostly uneventful; simple mathematic calculations, a brief discourse of animals, and then a free period. While most of the children used free time to play games or draw, Nina spent her time in her usual place reading. A passing glance revealed Sandrina and Hannah scowling in the corner. Nina allowed herself some relief knowing Mrs McCoy was in the classroom; while the two kids were obviously in a rotten mood from the day's events, they weren't so stupid to attempt to tease Nina in front of a teacher.

Finally, the bell heralded the end of another school day. Nina pushed the book back in her backpack, and started towards the door. However, she was stopped by Mrs. McCoy.

"Just a moment please, Nina. I want to speak with you."

After the classroom had emptied, she knelt down to Nina's level, a more serious expression on her face.
"All right Nina, we're alone now and no one will overhear anything, so you can be totally honest. You can tell me anything you like. Do you understand?"

Nina nodded, curious as to where this conversation was going.

"Nina," Mrs. McCoy began, "I've noticed you've been getting teased by the other kids. I saw Sandrina during recess today, and I get the feeling that this isn't the first time this has happened. Is this true?"

"If you mean them teasing me about my size, then yes it has happened before," Nina replied. "But in all honesty, I actually don't mind it much."

"Are you sure?"

"Well, I've already mentioned to you about me wanting to get bigger, right? So really, their insults are more like compliments."

"Well, if you're not bothered by it, then I won't interfere," Mrs. McCoy replied. "But if you ever need help or if they do anything to hurt you, then you let me know, all right?"

"Yes ma'am," Nina answered with a reassuring smile.

"Good girl. Oh! Speaking of your weight, I have a little something for you!" Mrs. McCoy reached into a small bag, and pulled out three massive chocolate bars! Nina did her best not to drool at the sight. "Oh thank you!", she exclaimed. "Thank you so much, Mrs. McCoy! Chocolate is my favorite!"
She paused, and shyly added, "Well, after fried chicken. And pizza...and cheesecake...and ice cream..."

Mrs. McCoy chuckled in response. "Anything for my star student! Now you head on home. And remember, don't be afraid to come tell me if you get bullied. See you tomorrow, Nina."

Nina grabbed her backpack and waddled her way out as quickly as she could. Outside in the school parking lot, she managed to find her mother waving her over, and she happily jumped into her car.

"Hello honey. How was school?"

"It was fine, Mommy. But...I lost another button on my blouse."

"Sweetie," her mother complained, "that's the fourth one you've popped this month. You know I can't keep repairing your clothes forever."

"I'm sorry, mom, it was an accident..."

"I understand, sweetie. We'll get it fixed when we get home."

Her mother began the long drive home. Nina undid some of the buttons on her blouse, her belly pushing out as she got comfortable. Shethen opened her book – and one of her secret present chocolate bars – and resumed reading as they returned home.
12311.title: Do you get teased?

123111.content:
Later, the door was unlocked, and Nina walked inside her home, her belly jiggling and swaying slightly with each step. Mom went into the kitchen to set down her purse and things from work; Nina walked into the living room, set down her backpack, and flopped down on the couch, exhausted from school.

"Honey? Would you like something to eat while you rest?", Nina's mom asked from inside the kitchen. "Yes please!", Nina replied happily.
"What would you like?"
'''Hm...could we maybe have some burgers, or maybe some ice cream?"
Her mother shook her head. "Cheeseburgers will spoil your appetite, but you may have some ice cream."
"Thanks, mom!"

Nina sighed and took off her coat. She sat on the couch, laid back on one of the throw-pillows and closed her eyes, letting her mind relax from the day. She awoke several minutes later when she felt something cold on her lap: the ice cream bucket.
"Make sure not to spill any of it on the couch, ok?", her mom cautioned as she turned back to the kitchen. "And make sure to save some room for dinner when dad comes home."
Nina happily grabbed the bucket of ice cream, and dug in. Scoop after scoop disappeared down her throat as she savored the cooling sensation it gave her as it slipped down her throat and entered her belly. After several hours, the ice cream left over was inside Nina's bloated belly; she started looking like one of the bean-bag chairs at her school! Nina's mom, in the meantime, was flipping through channels to see what was on TV, and the two awaited the return of Nina's father.
123111.title: Arrive home

choices: Nina's parents have something to say!
1231111.content:
Nina glanced at the T.V., briefly interrupting her slight food coma. Her mother was looking at one of those home shopping channels. Nina couldn't think of any channel more boring; her grandmother always cautioned her against buying from TV. Truthfully, Nina never planned to (except the occasional protein shake or anything that could aid her in her weight gain goal), but her mother would occasionally make a couple of purchases from the channel.
As she reached for her backpack to pull out her book, she suddenly remembered the chocolate she had been given after class. She contemplated whether to eat them or not, when suddenly the doorbell rang.

She got up and excited raced to the door as fast as her weight would allow.
"Well at least that's some exercise she does." Her mother muttered under her breath.

"Daddy! Daddy!", Nina cheered as she raced to her father, who scooped her into his arms happily. He used to be able to lift her up, but lately it had become harder to do so, so instead he opted to simply kneel to her level and hug her.

"Hey! How's my big girl?", Nina's father greeted, giving his daughter's tummy a friendly pinch, eliciting a giggle.
Nina's mother entered the room, and kissed her husband. Nina gave a wide grin, and took her place back before the television. Whenever dad returned home, it was sure that dinner was to follow shortly. In the meantime, she relaxed on the couch and distracted herself with the television. She moved a hand to her stomach, feeling how nice and soft she had grown...

"Hey, you fat pig!"

Nina blushed again as she recalled Sandrina's comment from earlier. She smiled, hugging her plump body, feeling her fat oozing against her arms.
'I'm gonna get so big and fat...', she thought to herself. The thought excited her...

"Nina! Dinner time!"

Nina snapped out of her fantasies, and headed to the dining room. She was starving, and her daydreams had renewed her vigor. Upon seeing the dining table, she beheld six platters – 3 for her, and 3 for her parents. While Nina's father was more relaxed and accepting of her wishes, her mother was more health-concours, and tended to only eat light. As such, she avoided greasy food as much as possible, to Nina's chagrin' however, Nina made up for it by increasing her portions.

Tonight they dined on mashed potatoes, salads for mom, and - as she was promised - fried chicken. As Nina hungrily filled her plate, her mother spoke up. "Nina, sweetie, remember leave some for everyone else."
"I will, mom," Nina replied, already hungrily devouring her meal with haste.
Her mother sighed, an air of mild annoyance and disappointment about her.
"Hey," father chimed in attempting to lighten the mood, "at least she has a healthy appetite!"

"She sure does..."

Nina hungrily devoured as much as she could; with each bite she gulped down, she could feel her belly stretch out and expand bit by bit. As she slipped the last piece on her plate past her lips, she swallowed it down and laid back, her hands resting on her swollen belly.
1231111.title: Dinner

12311111.content:
"What's for dessert?" Nina asked.

Mother and father looked to each other with a knowing look, and looked more seriously to Nina. Nina's relaxed smile quickly disappearing, replaced with a concerned expression.

"Eh Nina," her mother asked, "Your father and I have something we need to ask you."

Nina sat up straight with some difficulty. For a split second, she was worried she might've overstepped herself, and made her mother reconsider about her weight. It had taken a lot of time and effort, enduring punishments and lectures, before Nina had finally convinced her mother it was her desire, and even longer before mother finally agreed to allow her to gain as she wished. Nina shuddered at the prospect of having to go through all that again...
Which made the next sentence her mother spoke all the more surprising.

"What would you think if we took another child?"

Nina dropped her silverware on the table, the fork rattling as it danced on the tabletop. She stared in stunned silence as she processed what she had just been told...

"...mom's having a baby?"

Her dad bust out laughing, but quickly restrained himself under the glare from his wife. "No, Mom's not having a baby yet. We wanted to talk about it with you, first."

Nina groaned in her seat. "Why'd ya go and get me all excited like that? I have always wanted a little sister!"

"Well, it could also be a boy." Her mother replied, smiling.
"Or two." Her father added.
"Oh, I hope not. Just one is already a lot of work, boy or girl."
"Or triplets!" Nina cheered.
"Stop it. That's not funny."
Nina giggled in response. "Seriously, though, I wouldn't mind a little brother or sister. What stopped you from making one before?"

"Well there were some issues," Nina's mother explained. "There were problems at work, your father had been looking for a new job, and then we found out you were wanting to gain weight, so there was so much to process. We didn't know if we could handle another baby."

'Of course, she couldn't leave that out of it,' Nina thought to herself, restraining her urge to groan at her mother.

"So...is everything ok to do it now?"

"Well honey, we'll do our best. If the doctor is right, we should do it now. But even if i get pregnant, it'll-"

"-Still be nine months before it's born," Nina finished.

"Good girl," her father said, ruffling the hair on her head. "Now go ahead and clean up your plate. It's almost bedtime, and you've got school tomorrow, young lady."

Nina nodded, licking her plates clean and stacking them for the dishwasher. With some difficulty balancing the extra weight in her belly, she got on her feet and her mother guided her upstairs for a bath. After she was completely clean (paying extra attention to her stuffed belly), she dried herself off, and donned her pj's. She giggled as she saw her belly poking out between the pants and shirt.

"Hee hee! Oops! Looks like I ate a bit too much today," Nina said proudly, patting her bloated gut. Her mother knelt down to inspect, a slight frown on her face.
"Oh no...well, we'll get some new clothes tomorrow after school, all right?"

Nina nodded, and after brushing her teeth, she was tucked into bed. After giving her mother a good night kiss, the lights turned off and she was left to herself.
She closed her eyes, and rested her hands on her bloated belly. She listened to the soft gurgling sound it made as her meal digested within her.

"...goodnight, you fat little piggy," Nina said to herself as she drifted off to sleep. "You'll be nice and round in no time..."
12311111.title: What would you say if we....

choices: grab a late-night "snack", and return to bed?
be patient - return to sleep, and eat a big breakfast in the morning?
123111111.content:
Nina was sitting in school, reading a story. She felt someone poke her arm; 'probably trying to tease me again', she thought. So she closed her book, and looked up to see a boy, standing next to her.

"...H-hello..." the boy said shyly.
Nina was confused; "...hello.", she replied. "Um, is there something I can help you with?"
"Um, n-no...", the boy answered, "...I was just going to ask, um...w-would you mind if I sat with you in lunch?"
Nina was surprised. Normally, on the popularity scale, she was fairly low, due to her extra size. But here was someone asking to sit with her, and they weren't poking fun at her weight.
"Well, ok. I don't know why you're asking, though, but sure, I don't mind if you sit with me."
The boy smiled and said "Thanks", sounding relieved. He then walked away, but Nina saw a blush on his face just before he turned away.
Nina thought for a moment, and then opened her book. She was momentarily startled when she saw that, instead of complete words in her book, they were now just gibberish and squiggles! "Wha?!", she said aloud, shocked at the change.

Then, she realized, she was in her room, in her pajamas, on her bed.

"I must've had a dream", she concluded quietly. "But that was weird. Why would the text just suddenly jumble up?" She shrugged it off, and was about to fall asleep when she heard an ever-familiar growl. She looked down to see her belly, slightly plushier than she remembered, but grumbling to be fed.
She sat up, and held her large, growling belly in her tender hands. "Don't you worry," she whispered, "I'll take care of you."

She thouht a moment; she was awake, and her parents were no doubt asleep, if they did...what they said they'd do. 'Hm....perhaps I could risk consuming a late-night snack while they're asleep?', she thought. She knew that it was hardest to wake up people when they were dreaming, so it was reasonable they might not hear...
123111111.title: Suddenly, a dream!

choices: Next morning she wakes up by herself
Next morning her parents wakes her up
1231111111.content:
Her tummy interrupted her musings, and voiced its opinion with a slightly louder grumble.

'...well, I suppose i can just take a small midnight snack...if only to hush my tummy up.'

Quietly as she could, Nina got out of bed and cracked opened the door, without a sound. Whereas walking on one's toes, in the classic cartoon style, would work better for a lighter individual, Nina had observed that walking as such would make more noise, since her weight would be more focused. Instead, walking flat-footed would spread the weight across the foot, thus making less noise for someone her size.
She proceeded out her room and to the stairs, listening carefully to her surroundings.

Still no sound; her parents were still asleep. Good.

Now came the hard part: the stairs. If there was any part of her voyage that could fail, this was the danger zone.
Slowly she stepped on the first stair, a small creak created as her weight pushed against the floorboards. As she headed further downstairs, she could hear a creak each time she put her feet down. Fortunately, her parents didn't seem to wake up. Finally, after half an hour of sneaking, Nina made it downstairs, and not a peep from her parents room. Quiet as a mouse (a very big and round mouse), she snuck into the kitchen and closed the door behind her to minimize the noises.

'Phase 1, complete', Nina thought to herself proudly. 'Now for phase 2...'

She walked over to the cupboard, and began scavenging for treats. Quickly and quietly, she ripped open a pretzel pack, and crammed as many pretzels in her mouth as possible. Soon she emptied the two pretzel packs there, and had moved onto the cookie jar. Plopping them into her waiting maw one at a time, she allowed herself a soft moan as she immersed herself in the chocolatey, gooey goodness she was consuming. Soon, the entire contents of the cookie jar had found their way within her growing stomach.

Nina burped quietly, a tender hand on her belly. She was no longer full, but something else was motivating her.

She wanted more.

She wanted to eat more.
She wanted to eat until her belly burst.

She wanted to get fat.
So fat.
Much fatter then she was now.

She was a fat little piggy.
And she wanted to be a good little piggy.
All good little piggies were nice and fat.
And to get fatter, she needed to eat.

She opened the refrigerator and began filling herself with everything she could fit inside. Bacon, cheese, cherry tomatoes, all went into her mouth. She gobbled up leaves of lettuce in between chugging the dressing. She slurped down the ketchup and mayonnaise as well, moaning as she felt the gooey condiments squish down into her belly. She found linked sausages, and swallowed them whole, link after link squeezing down her throat, down her esophagus, and plopping into her belly, one by one.

But it wasn't enough. Nina wanted more.

Nina opened a bottle of soda and started to chug it down. She whimpered softly as she felt her belly fill with the bubbling pop. With great difficulty, the last of the soda disappeared down her throat, and she tossed the empty bottle aside. She filled herself with more and more; cherry tomatoes, cans of fruit, sticks of butter...even the rest of the ice cream soon was consumed by the ravenous little girl.

Finally, a belch escaped her lips, signaling she had eaten enough. Nina rested against the cupboards, dazed from her feeding frenzy. She moaned softly as she strained her eyes open. The refrigerator door hung open; it was almost empty now. All around her, empty boxes and cans littered the floor, crumbs coating around her mouth and on her chest. Her belly now pushed her shirt up around her chest, sagging on her thighs. As she placed a hand on her stomach, she swore she could almost feel the sausages and tomatoes underneath her skin, churning inside her.

"Oh my," Nina quietly exclaimed in shock. "...did I really just eat all of that?"

She winced suddenly, as the soreness of her 'snack' had caught up with her. Her emotions were a complex mixture. On the one hand, when her parents woke up tomorrow, she was sure to get a stern lecture about her actions. But on the one hand...knowing just how far she'd let herself go...
...it made her feel good.
She ate so much...the soreness she felt was a good soreness. She really felt like a fat pig now. She had eaten almost everything in the kitchen, just as midnight snack.

'There isn't anything left for breakfast,' she mused as she rubbed her bloated gut, '...but at the same time, I think I can afford to skip breakfast tomorrow.'

Fighting the food coma she found herself in, Nina waited five minutes before she found the strength to get up. Quietly, she took all the empty bags, boxes, cans and garbage, and threw it in the trash bin. Then, her belly sloshing with each step, she made her way upstairs as quietly as her fattening body would allow her.

The rational part of her mind was swamped with dread at what her parents would do. After fighting for so long to convince them to allow her to get bigger, she had gone and done the one thing that might make them change their mind. Without a sound, she snuck back into her room and closed the door behind her. 'Well, it won't do me good to fret over it now,' she reasoned. 'What's done is done...I'll have to take my medicine as it comes. Who knows, I might get out of this intact.'
She crawled back into bed, turning over onto her back. Her bloated belly rose up like a small mountain over her. Overcome by the food coma from the massive amount she had consumed, Nina passed out within the minute, and slept while her gurgling stomach digested her huge meal...
1231111111.title: A midnight snack

choices: She's arrived early, so she can eat another breakfast at school!  Score!
She faces the children's teasing in the morning, an enjoys every bit of it.
12311111112.content:
Nina woke up to see her mother and father sitting beside her bed. She knew what was coming next.
"Nina?", her mother asked, "would you happen to know why half the fridge and pantry are empty?"
Nina decided it wouldn't do any good denying it. "Yes. I woke up last night, and I got a little hungry, so I decided to eat something..."

"Nina, honey, if you were hungry you should've just told us," her father said, partly impressed at her daughter's appetite, but still upset with her for sneaking food. "I wouldn't have minded cooking a snack for you."
"Well, I did think of that, but I remember you two were needing some alone-time, and I didn't want to disturb you. I'm really sorry, mom and dad."
"Ugh...it's ok," her mother said. "But next time, please try to wait for us? I'd prefer to keep tabs on what you eat, so I know when to go shopping."
"Ok," Nina said, hugging her mom. "Well, maybe I can make it up to you?"
"We'll see. Now come on, time for school."
"Ok!"

Nina dressed herself, quickly ate some poptarts, and she and her parents drove her to school.
When she got to school...
12311111112.title: Next morning her mother wakes her up

choices: Hannah and Sandrina try too tease Nina
123111111122.content:
Nina managed to find some clothes that still fit her, albeit some of her belly still strained to fit. As she entered school, she could feel the stares from the other kids. A few even launched some jeers at her.

"Woah, look at the whale that walked into school!"

"Hey there, little piggy! Did you stuff your fat face s'more yesterday? Oink oink!"

"Wow, her parents must go broke trying to find clothes that fit that belly..."

All the while, each insult only made Nina more pleased. She was growing into a big, fat piggy, just like she wanted. Each insult turned into a compliment...

"Wow, Nina! You must've grown as big as a whale! You look amazing!"

"Hey, Nina! You must've eaten a lot to fill that wonderful belly of yours! Looking amazing!"

"I love how your tight clothes show off your soft curves and beautiful body!"

Nina smiled, her plump and thick hips swaying and jiggling with each step, and entered the classroom, full of love in more ways than one.


--------------------------------------------------------


As she entered, the bullies Sandrina and Hannah crossed her gaze again. Nina smiled inside, waiting for what wonderful compliments she'd receive from them today. She knew that if the two of them knew she liked their insults, they would change tactics and try to hurt her some other way.

And she didn't want to stop receiving their compliments.

Finally, Mrs. McCoy arrived, and class was ready to begin. Nina and the rest of the class took their seats, with Nina just barely squeezing into hers.

"I see a F, i see a A and a T. It's fat, it's fat, it's you. I can see your fat lard ball."

Nina looked over her shoulder, and saw it was Sandrina with a smirk on her face. She looked down and saw some of her soft flab was poking out from below her shirt.
It wasn't until Sandrina gave it a painful pinch that Nina suddenly regretted not wearing a coat.

"I see a F, i see a A, i see–"Sandrina started, but was suddenly interrupted by Nina.

"–Yeah, I heard, Sandrina," Nina answered slightly meaner than she intended. "I see a F for you, too."

Sandrina looked confusedly at the fat little pig in front of her. Then she remembered yesterday's lesson, and delivered an angry glare at Nina as McCoy began the day.

"Well hello you all."

"Hello Mrs. McCoy all kids said polite.

"Good. You'll be receiving your grades from spelling Hannah give me that rubber band!"

Hannah guiltily handed the rubber band to Mrs. McCoy, under the gaze of all the giggling students who had turned to see her. Not that it would matter much; she probably had another dozen in her pocket, ready to use.
After Mrs. McCoy turned her back, Hannah shot Nina a hateful glare, and ran her finger across her throat. Nina quietly turned away, more than a little uneasy at Hannah's illogically threatening...well, threat.

Mrs. McCoy had begun passing out the graded papers to the class. Nina had of course received a perfect A. However, not everyone was so lucky...

"A F!" Sandrina screamed, as Nina struggled to resist saying 'I called it'. "Are your serious?! How do I have a F?"

"How about less teasing, less disrupting my class, and more studying. Unless you want spend another year here?"

The day went on as normal – the same classes, the same results. All the while, Nina made sure she was within sight of her teacher, and as far away from Hanna and Sandrina as possible. She knew the two would be more than upset after the day's events, and she wanted to avoid provoking a confrontation. She hoped she could avoid them during recess...
123111111122.title: The start of another day

choices: "Yeah.  Let's fatten that little pig up!"
"...then again, maybe not.  But what else could we do?  Hmm..."
1231111111222.content:
Lunch was in about ten minutes. Hannah and Sandrina sat in the corner of the room, plotting their revenge.

"Nina's gonna regret making fun of us..." Sandrina quietly declared.

"How is it she never seems to get upset whenever we tease her?", Hannah asked. "It's like she's, I dunno...tuning us out, or something."

Sandrina huffed, a scowl on her face. "She might think she's better than us, but she's not perfect. There has to be a way to get to her. There's got to, I just know it!"

"But whenever we try making fun of her, she either blows it off or teases us back..."

Sandrina closed her eyes, deep in thought. Everyone knew being fat was gross and unhealthy, she thought, so Nina had to be just as disgusted with herself as everyone else was. 'But how can we get her to see it?', she thought. 'We'll have to shove her fatness in her face, in a way that hits her directly...but how can we do-?'

Suddenly, it hit her. "Hey, Hannah! What if we made her fatter?", Sandrina proposed.

"What? Make her fatter?"

Sandrina turned to Hannah. "Hear me out. Whenever we try to tease her, she blows it off or tosses a comeback at us, right?"
Hannah nodded, attempting to follow the logic being thrown at her.
"So what we need is more people behind us! If everyone in school's making fun of her, then she'll finally realize what a fat cow she is! So if we make her bigger, then more people would notice and start making fun of her!"

Hannah thought a moment, processing Sandrina's idea. "That makes sense...we can't handle her when it's just the two of us, but if we have more people on our side, then we have more firepower!"
Her face lit up with a devious grin; however, immediately afterwards, the deviousness faded in place of concern. "But Sandrina... do you think we'll be able to pull it off? What if Nina caches us? Or worse...Mrs. McCoy herself?"

"I think we can pull it off, Hannah. We'll have to be sneaky about it, and slip her extra food where she won't notice. My big brother works at the cafeteria, if you'll remember; I bet he can give Nina slightly more for her lunches."

"Or maybe we could act friendly? Maybe offer her our lunches, so she gets 3 times the normal amount?"

"Yeah! So what do you say, Hannah? Wanna try it?"

Hannah answered....
1231111111222.title: The bullies plot...

12311111112221.content:
"Yeah let's fatten the little pig up!" Hannah clenched her hands into fists.

"Alright," Sandrina's replied, "But remember, we gotta play this sneaky. Nina is pretty smart; I don't think she'll believe it if we suddenly start acting nice to her...she'd probably suspect a trap."

"Yeah...we gotta make it convincing. Make it seem like we're being forced to be around her, or something."

The two sat there, plotting their revenge. Then suddenly, Sandrina had another idea...

----------------------------

In the meantime, Nina was admiring herself. She pushed her hands deep against her fat belly, feeling her soft skin and warm body. The chocolate Mrs McCoy gave her really helped; she could feel her body was bigger. She smiled, and slapped her belly softly, making it jiggle like gelatin. She giggled, and sat back in her usual spot in the reading corner. She pulled out her book, opened it to where she left off, and resumed reading...


“How're we getting to King's Cross tomorrow, Dad?" asked Fred as they dug into a sumptuous pudding.
"The Ministry's providing a couple of cars," said Mr. Weasley.
Everyone looked up at him.
"Why?" said Percy curiously.
"It's because of you, Perce," said George seriously. "And there'll be little flags on the hoods, with HB on them-"
"-for Humongous Bighead," said Fred."

"Lunch time!", Mrs. McCoy called, pulling Nina out of her reading trance. As the children headed for the cafeteria, they all lined up with their plates. As Nina approached the servers, one of the cafeteria staff - an older boy - smiled pleasantly at her, and gave her an extra helping. Nina was confused' she hadn't done anything to warrant any special treatment.
"Between you and me," the boy added in response, "we're probably going to have leftovers for today. So here's a little extra for you. You look like you could use it!"
Nina blushed, unsure of whether to take the comment as a genuine concern or if he was told to do so by someone else. Nevertheless, she smiled, and took her seat, ready to gobble up her food. With the first bite, she noticed the food tasted off...it seemed sweeter than usual, she thought. She looked around, but none of the other kids seemed to notice. 'Perhaps it was just my imagination?', she considered. Nina shrugged, and resumed eating.

---------------------------------------------------------

On the other side of the cafeteria, Sandrina and Hannah were quietly munching on their own lunch while quietly observing their chosen target.
"It worked," Sandrina observed.
"She didn't even question it," Hannah added. "She just dug right into it, the fat pig."

"So my brother was able to get her food extra-buttered, to make it even fattier. And we were able to successfully sneak it to her without her questioning it."

"That's good, but...is there anything else we should try? I mean, extra food during lunch would help, but I don't think she'll fatten up fast enough."

Sandrina grinned, an expression of cunning on her face. "Worry not, Hannah. I've got it all planned out." With that, she stood up, taking her lunch with her. 'C'mon, follow my lead."

Hannah followed, not willing to question the logic of her better. Casually, the pair walked right up to Nina. Nina noticed, and immediately prepared for the worst. It was Sandrina who spoke up first.

"Hey, listen. I'm calling a truce, ok?", Sandrina assured, in a stern yet serious tone of voice. "We wanna talk with you about something."

Nina stared at them like she had just been slapped in the face with a fish. "...you're joking."

"No, we're serious!", Hannah added, somewhat unsure at the situation, but following as she was told. "L-look, can we just talk without the whole fatty stuff?"

Sandrina nudged Hannah with her elbow, taking a seat across from Nina. In a single fluid motion, she pulled her F-grade assignment out, and placed it facing Nina.

"So look. I have an F. And what do you have? An A+."

"...ok..." Nina cautiously replied.

Sandrina groaned in frustraion. "Ok, listen. Everything I'm going to say stays between us, ok? No telling the teachers, no telling other students, nobody."

Nina nodded. Clearly something was wrong; this was not Sandrina's typical attitude, that was for sure.

"You...are s-smarter than me. And honestly, if I keep getting poor grades, then my parents are gonna kill me."
"Yeah, mine too," Hannah parroted.
"So I tell you this because I don't want you thinking I'm asking to be your friend, ok? We just...we need you h-help."

Nina held up a finger, processing the situation as it was being explained to her. "Wait...are you asking me to tutor you?"

Sandrina raised an eyebrow. "What's that?"

"I mean teaching you. You're asking me if I'll help you study for the reading and writing lessons we have. Is that right?"

Sandrina nodded. "Y-yes. Look, I know we've said some things, and you're probably the last person we'd expect to ask for help. But...please? At least help us get to C-level. And then we can go back to how we were before, and you don't have to help us anymore."

Nina almost couldn't believe what she was hearing. The bullies were coming to her for help? The rational part of herself ran over the evidence. Either this was a 1-in-1,000,000 event...or this was a trap.
"...I dunno," Nina cautiously answered. "Who's to say I'd be the best tutor for you? You could still end up failing, even with my help. Besides, I've never tutored anyone before..."

Sandrina gritted her teeth inside her mouth. 'TAKE IT ALREADY!'
"If we don't do anything, we'll fail for sure. Please, at least give it a try?"

Nina bore a look of uncertainty. Sandrina, having frustrated all her resources, pulled out her trump card.

"Look...if you agree to help us, then...w-we'll not tease you f-for the rest of the week. A-and if it works, and we get good grades, then we'll not tease you for the month. How does that sound?"

"...you're not exactly selling me on this," Nina replied, not too eager to lose her daily compliments.

It was at this point that Hannah buckled. "Look, what do you want from us, free food?"
That stopped both of them. Sandrina was almost about to pull Hannah away to chastise her, when Nina suddenly spoke.
"...free food?"
Sandrina was momentarily stunned, but ran with it. "If you help us, we'll give you our lunches here at school, and I'll have my mom buy you some fried chicken. Do we have a deal?"
12311111112221.title: Greasy lunch

choices: Sandrina opened the door, alone, and shows Nina the food.
Sandrina opened the door with Hannah, and the two girls start "studying".
123111111122211.content:
Nina's rational mind gave way to her belly's desires. At the magic words 'fried chicken', she was sold. She stuck out a chubby hand to shake. "Deal!"

Sandrina shook the fat-fingered hand, disgusted on the inside but glad that her ruse had worked. "Wonderful! Tha-...th-thank you, Nina."

Nina nodded. "So what time would be good for you? I'm free all week; do you wanna meet up after school?"

"Uh...h-how about you come over to my house after school today?"

"Sure!", Nina replied happily, digging into her lunch again. "I'll ask mom when she picks me up."

"Ok, sounds good. We'll talk more later," Sandrina replied, getting up and dragging Hannah away with her. Nina's rational mind instantly pointed out how foolish she had been, but she paused upon noticing that Hannah and Sandrina had left their lunches...just as they said they would...

------------------

In private, Sandrina growled to Hannah as quiet as she could. "WHAT WERE YOU THINKING, SAYING THAT?!"

Hannah froze in place. "Sh-she went for it, didn't she? She's a pig, food's the only thing she'd go for!"

"You almost blew our cover with that! You're lucky I was here to sweet-talk her into accepting that deal. If I hadn't been there, she'd have called us out, and we'd have to start all over again!"

Hannah dipped her head in shame. Sandrina forced herself to relax, and started again. "Still...we got lucky that she went for it. Now we'll have Nina in a place we can get her food more easily, and this plan'll go smoother and quicker."

---------------------
Later...

Nina felt uneasy. While Sandrina and Hannah had both demonstrated unusual clarity and, dare she say, enthusiasm for being tutored, she couldn't help but be wary. She was, after all, traveling into the heart of enemy territory alone with no backup. Even if it was under peaceful pretenses, if something were to happen, she'd be completely isolated until her parents returned to pick her up.
On the plus side, the lure of free food plus the fact that she hadn't eaten since leaving school was making her eager to get there.

Finally, Nina's rational fears and stomach's desires were satisfied, as they stopped in front of Sandrina's house. A mid-sized 2-story house lay before them, with Sandrina on the steps waving her arms in the air. Nina's mother helped her out of the car, ensured her daughter had the phone ready, and then drove off, leaving Nina alone to enter the bully's home...
123111111122211.title: An agreement

1231111111222112.content:
Hannah opened the door and joined Sandrina on the steps as Nina walked up to them.
"Nice to see you came here, Nina," Sandrina replied pleasantly. "Come on in, we've been waiting!"

Nina smiled awkwardly, and stepped in just as a loud growl emanated from her chubby belly. She blushed and let out an awkward laugh. "Eheh...s-sorry, I usually have dinner around this time."

Hannah got a smile on her face, while Sandrina kept things cordial. "It's fine; my brother is getting some food at KFC, so he should be back in a few minutes. In the meantime, you can start helping us get better."

"Fair enough. Alright, let's get some pencils and paper, then we can get to work on this."

The three took refuge in the dining room. Despite her "mean girl" appearance, Sandrina's home life was very...ordinary. She had one brother, two parents, and a sister who apparently lived out of town and never visited them. While she was a bully at school, at home she was...polite, if nothing else. She never once teased her or called her names, like she would normally do in school.

As they practiced reading, writing, and spelling, Sandrina spoke up.
"Nina, how do you know so much? You're the same age as us, but you're so far ahead."

Nina paused, contemplating the question. "...I'm not entirely sure. I suppose it's just because I liked reading, so I had more practice. Since I read more, I got used to the words faster."

"So because you read more books, you can spell easier?", Hannah clarified, still somewhat unconvinced.

"That's the best explanation I could see. The more you expose yourself to the words, the easier it gets to understand them. I started with basic children's books, then moved on to actual books with no pictures, and now I'm reading grown-up books."

"Like that book you read! The Prisoner of Abbadon!"

Nina's head hit the desk as she held her giggling in as much as she could. She didn't do a very good job.

"Az-ka-ban, Hannah."

The three practiced until another half-hour had passed, when Nina was surprised to see Sandrina's brother – the boy from the cafeteria – walking in with five buckets of fried chicken. Nina was shocked. The same guy here was giving her extra yummy food...twice in the same day.
He placed the buckets on the table in a row. Hannah and Sandrina both took a bucket at the end; they knew the other buckets were meant for Nina, and had been specially buttered up for her. Nina tentatively grabbed one of the buckets and started eating; she had never eaten in front of strangers before.

As they resumed the lesson, Sandrina noticed Nina eating a bit slower than she normally did in school. "You don't have to be shy about it," she replied. "Like I said, we won't be teasing you for it. If you're hungry, then eat." Nina nodded, and quickened her pace as they practiced. In a few minutes, to everyone's surprise, she had cleaned out the entire bucket.

"What a pig." Hannah whispered a little louder than intended, making the target uneasy.
"Sorry, I was hungry..." Nina replied apologetically.

Sandrina elbowed Hannah, glaring at her. Hannah took the cue, and added a quick "sorry".
"It's ok, Nina," Sandrina comfortingly assured her. "She's just not used to the whole 'business' part of this arrangement. The other three buckets there are also for you, if you want... You don't have to feel ashamed for being hungry."

Nina still felt unsure; while Hannah had momentarily lapsed back into the bully mindset she typically associated with them, Sandrina seemed to be acting more cordial and respectable. Her stomach begging to be filled, yet her rationality keeping her cautious, she opted to trust Sandrina, and resumed her eating while the tutoring proceeded.

-------------------------------------

Hannah and Sandrina continued following Nina's directions, writing out the words, pronouncing them, and using them in sentences. All the while, Nina was kept well-fed; after the chicken was gone, she was given specially-prepared hot dogs and ice cream. All of which ended up inside her growing belly. After another hour of tutoring and stuffing herself, Nina leaned back in her chair, a tender hand placed on her gut. A soft moan escaped her lips, drawing some concern from Sandrina and Hannah.

"Are you all right?" Sandrina asked.

"Yeah...ooh...I think I ate a bit too much."

Sandrina got up to look over the results. Nina's belly had almost doubled in circumference; her clothes, which had been fairly loose when she arrived, were now snugly fitting against her body, albeit her belly did poke out from below her shirt a bit. Her pants were struggling to keep her thick thighs contained, and her belt had all but given up.

Sandrina smiled. "I think that'll probably be enough for the night. Here, let me get your phone, if you wanna call for your parents." She procured Nina's cell phone from her bag, and held it out to Nina. Nina weakly nodded, and took the phone, as Sandrina dragged Hannah away.

"Hey!" Hannah quietly protested. "This is going great! She's blowing up like a balloon! Why are we stopping now?"

"We've fed her enough for today," Sandrina explained, "if we try to feed her more, she'll either throw up or get suspicious."

"Oh yeah."
"We have to play this safe."

Hannah nodded, and the two eventually returned to watch over Nina as her father came to pick her up. They watched her, weakened and trapped in her seat by her weight...stuffed like a pig...her belly begging to be touche–

'–Woah, where did THAT thought come from," Sandrina stopped herself.

-------------------------------------------------
The Next Day...

As Sandrina and Hannah walked to class, they found themselves greeting a slightly plumper Nina in the reading corner.

"Hey there, Nina," Sandrina calmly greeted. To her surprise, though, Nina replied a bit bashfully.
"Hey, Sandrina...uh, sorry for eating all your food yesterday."

Sandrina was shocked; this was not how Nina usually responded when they greeted her. Had her plan made such a difference so soon?
"It's fine, that was the deal. Same time tonight?"

Nina nodded, and added, "Oh, and if you want to keep teasing me, that's fine. I understand you have a reputation to keep up."

Sandrina grew flustered, but managed to compose herself. "Th-then alright, pig! We'll see you later tonight then."
1231111111222112.title: Tutoring and a lot of food

12311111112221121.content:
A full week had passed, and Nina was caught off guard as she entered the reading corner. There, where she normally sat, was a bucket of chicken. There was even a note on the bucket noting it was specifically for her; someone had apparently left her a present.
Nina contemplated for a moment who would leave her this extra gift, during school no less. Logically, it must have been from someone who wished to not be known, whether by her or others. Without further evidence, she opted to not flog a gift horse in the mouth, and moved the bucket next to the bean bag chair. There, she took her seat, opened the bucket, and began devouring a drumstick.

The bullies' plot to fatten her up had been a resounding success' over the course of the past three days, an extra 15 pounds had somehow found their way onto Nina's frame. Not that she minded, of course; to Nina, every extra pound she acquired was just another bit of her body to love. Even if she was wearing clothes that would've fit better on 12-year olds, she continued her usual pattern of eating as she pleased.
The chicken slid down her thirst, lightly coating her lips in buttery grease. She licked her lips in an attempt to clean them off, and was about to start on a second piece when someone interrupted her.

"So what happened to lunchtime, Nina?", Mrs. McCoy asked Nina, who froze in embarrassment.
"I-I'm sorry, ma'am," she apologized. "I found this in my seat, along with a little note that said it was a present for me. I was going to save it for later, but..."
As if on cue, a soft growl from her stomach betrayed her hungry motives.
Mrs. McCoy smiled and patted Nina's head. "Ok, you can eat it. But next time, I would suggest you ask me before you dig in."
"Yes ma'am, Mrs. McCoy! Sorry again," Nina said politely, and returned to eating her chicken, while finishing up the 3rd Harry Potter book.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------

Sandrina had arrived a little late, but made it in time to avoid missing any crucial bits of the lesson. After the lecture, Hannah greeted her superior. "Sandrina, where were you? I thought you said we were going to plan out our next move for the weekend?"

"Sorry, I had forgotten my homework at home," Sandrina replied. "But yes, I had an idea about how to handl–"

"-Wait," Hannah interrupted, "you...you actually completed the homework?"

For a moment, Sandrina was confused. Then, registering what her friend had said, she answered. "Oh, yeah! I know, right? I actually managed to finish it this time! But who knows if the grade'll be any different from usual."

Hannah shook her head, as if clearing her head of distractions. "Aaaaaanyway, I snuck the chicken into school without anyone noticing, just like you said. And Nina ate it all up before class began."

"Wow, she finished the whole bucket that fast?"

"I know, right? What a pig." Hannah rolled her eyes in disgust. "So now what do we do? We can't feed her over the weekend."

"Actually," Sandrina corrected, "I have a plan about that. We'll be able to keep her eating lots over the weekend, and all without anyone suspecting a thing."

"Really, how?", Hannah asked, wide-eyed and curious.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------

"A sleepover?", Nina questioned as she finished the last of her lunch and started on Sandrina's. Once again, they had met up during lunch for a meeting, with Sandrina and Hannah opposite their tutor.

"I-It's not like that, honest," Sandrina defended. "I was figuring it'd be a little more, um...like it would help us both out, uh...what's the word?"
"Beneficial?"
"Yeah, that! I was figuring it would be be-ne-fi-cial for both of us. You could tutor us over the weekend, and... maybe I could ask mom if she'd take us to a buffet, or maybe go to the movies or something?"

Nina closed her eyes as she munched on her second lunch. "...ok then, I'll ask mum to drop me off tonight then?"
"Sounds good! Thanks again, Nina", Sandrina politely replied. The two then left Nina alone to finish her meals.

Nina closed her eyes, shaking her head slightly. 'Yeah, they're up to something,' Nina deduced. 'Even if they were desperate, a sleepover would be the last thing they'd ask of me.' Nina pushed the last bit of Sandrina's lunch past her lips, stacking the empty tray atop hers. 'No good letting them know I'm suspicious now, though,' Nina mused as she began to dig into the 3rd tray of food. 'For the time being, let's proceed and see what they have planned...'
12311111112221121.title: Friday at school...

choices: Nina eats more the five plates

Her mom blushed and drove away while Nina walked too Sandrina's house. It did feel a bit strange. The two mean girls who always teased her at school asked for her help and she said yes. Sandrina cringed again. She wiped her tears and asked...

1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
Meanwhile, Hannah was back home, eating a very big "dinner". Her parents had gone to McDonald's, and requested a super-sized cheeseburger meal for their daughter, which came with a huge bucket of fries and a soda drink easily four times bigger than the average drink. They brought it home, of course - they still cared about their daughter, and knew it'd be easier on her to stuff herself at home.

Hannah had eaten all of the fries, and was halfway through the coke and just started the super-sized burger. She leaned back to take a break. Her stomach was full already from eating the fries, and stuck out in a big pot-belly, stretch marks covering the bottom of her belly. She moaned quietly, putting a tender hand on her bloated gut. She sincerely hoped her parents would give her a break, and let her finish the titanic meal later.

As Hannah tried to rub her tummy, her mother walked in. Hannah turned to her, and gave her a pleading look.
"Getting full?", her mother asked.
Hannah nodded, clutching her belly in her hands.
"Fine," her mother said. It wouldn't have done any good if she threw up everything she ate. "You eat a few more bites, and well help you get dressed for bed."
Hannah breathed out in relief, smiling gratefully. She grabbed the huge burger with both hands - it was almost as big as her teddy bear! - and took a big bite out of it.

Finally, she finished her second bite, and leaned back moaning. Hannah's father took the burger into the kitchen to wrap it up. Hannah's mom held the coke to her daughter's mouth, and the bloated little girl drank, as if it'd help ease her tummy's pain. Her mom helped her get up, and helped her upstairs. Hannah got into her pj's, which were already getting tight, and struggled into the bed. Hannah's mom covered her up, and tucked her in.
"Listen, Hannah," her mother said, trying to talk to her daughter, "I'm not doing this because I hate you, ok? You have to understand, it's wrong to kidnap someone, and even more to force-feed them against their will. I'm trying to help you understand what people like that go through, and the only real way to teach you is for you to fatten up and see what it's like. It's not because I hate you, sweetheart."

She placed a hand on Hannah's belly, which could be seen even through the blankets, and gently massaged it, rubbing in little circles. "I don't hate you, honey." Hannah raised her arms, and her mom leaned in, hugging her daughter. She let go, and got off the bed. "Goodnight, mm," Hannah said.
Hannah's mom wished her good night, and closed the door. Under the covers, Hannah continued rubbing her belly, as she drifted off to sleep...

"Um, is it ok if I can draw with you?", she asked. Nina smiled. "Of course you can!", she replied. "The more the merrier!", she added, jiggling her belly to complete the pun. Sandrina and Hannah chuckled at it, and Hannah grunted as she sat down.
She let out a moan as she put a hand on her larger belly. "How do you move with this?", she asked Nina, suddenly realizing that the obese girl might take her comment as an insult. But to her relief, Nina answered calmly, "I try not to. It's alot of work moving around with this, so I try to avoid moving around too much." She looked to Hannah and asked, "Did you eat recently?" Hannah nodded. "That explains it," Nina said. "It's a little easier to move after you let your stomach digest your meal. Then not only is it a bit lighter, but you have more energy. You need to rest some, and let your meal settle."
"That reminds me," Mrs. McCoy said, approaching Hannah with a bowl of ice cream. "Your mother's wanting you to eat more, so she gave me a tub of ice cream for you to eat through the day. Here's some for you. I'll check up on you after a while, and I'll give you more when it's empty, ok?"
Hannah nodded, taking the spoon and eating a bite. The teacher walked away, and Hannah sighed. "I just don't get why I have to eat ALL the time. I mean, isn't it the same as eating really fatty food in normal meals?"
"Maybe it's a way you can fit more food in your belly", Sandrina replied.
"Yeah," Nina added. "That's one way. Sometimes, in the summer, I had a day where I'd just snack nonstop so that there was always food coming in. If I could get used to having alot of food inside me, then I wouldn't get so many tummyaches. And it worked! Have you ever noticed I never seem to get tummyaches?"
Hannah and Sandrina's ears perked up when they heard this. It was true - she had never had a single stomachache all month! "Wow!", Hannah said. "Well, then I guess I got to stomach this." And with that, she took another mouthful.
"Be careful, now." Nina warned. "Take your time with it; don't rush."

At lunch, Hannah sat down next to Nina and Sandrina. She was about to dig into her meal when Nina cleared her throat, to get her attention. Hannah turned to her, and Nina pointed to her top lip. Hannah touched hers, and then realized she had an ice cream mustache.
She quickly licked it away, and turned back to her meal: a double-cheeseburger with ketchup and mustard, a fair amount of fries (definitely more than they'd give someone her age), and a 1-liter bottle of cherry soda, instead of the usual milk carton. Nina started gorging herself on the chicken and burgers, pausing once in a while to take a large drink of milk. As the two girls stuffed themselves, Nina noticed that Hannah was trying to keep up, matching Nina's pace. She smiled to herself, pleased at the thought of Hannah trying to keep pace with a fat girl like herself.

As lunch drew to a close, both girls were stuffed to the brim. Hannah was cradling her swollen gut, rubbing it to try to ease the load she ate. Sandrina was massaging Nina's massive stomach, squeezing and rubbing her fat rolls. Nina let out a groan; she was truly living up to the phrase "fat n' happy".

After lunch...
