"Well they know. I told them. Sure they were't happy with it. Especially my mother. But i really wanted to do it. After a lot of arguing my father and finally my mother agreed. My father does't talk much about it. My mother does let me notice every now and then but does't make too much trouble about it."

"Strange that you were punished because of what you did to Nina and now you her friend. Not that you had much choice. No one else wants too talk too you anymore."

"Well guess i can be glad Nina did't let me go too jail. But you forgive me no body else did."

"Some people have more trouble to forgive someone. I don't."

"Good thing you bought this book. I mean now you know what you can do.'
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Plus size model

1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
After recess, hannah quickly put away the magazine so that nobody'd find it. They prepared to return to their normal class, when one kid passed them by. He turned to Hannah, and said, "Hey, I think the zoo's lost a hippo!"

Hannah was about to grab a rubber band, when surprisingly, Nina responded. She smiled broadly, and said, "Well then you'd better be careful; hippos cause more deaths every year than lions do."

There was a pause from the startled kid. "...then I messed up that insult, didn't I?"
"yes," Nina replied, "yes you did."
"...right...". The child quickly left the three.

As the child left, and they all sat down, Nina let out a small sigh. Sandrina noticed this, and put a hand on the fat little girl. "Hey, you alright?"

Nina nodded. "Yeah...I remember when I used to get teased like that..."
Hannah smiled. "Well," she replied, "now you don't have to worry about it!"
Nina shook her head. "no, it's not that. It's just...I miss being teased like that."
Sandrina could only reply, "H-Huh?! B-But I thought you got teased every day!"

Nina sighed. "I used to. But now it seems everyone's teasing Hannah. So it looks like they've all forgotten little ol' me..."
"Nina, are you getting...jealous of me?". Hannah asked, stunned.
"No. I thought I already told you: I miss being teased."

Hannah thought a bit. "Well, what if we teased you some?"

Nina turned and gave Hannah a sweet innocent look. "would you mind?"

"not at all, Admiral Jelly-belly!". Hannah replied smiling.
Nina hugged her, and said, "Aw, you guys are the best!"
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Someone's teasing...

1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
"All right i start! Sandrina said. "You're so fat that your belt is the equator."

"When you wear a yellow coat outside people think: There comes the bus." Hannah said.

"When you were in a clothing store and you asked for something in your size they said: Try the elevator." Sandrina said.

Nina felt much better especially the one about the elevator made her giggle.

"When you walk in a room your belly comes in first and later your body!" Hannah yelled.

"You're so fat that when you step on a scale it yells: People please on at a time."

"It's not very nice to say that." A voice suddenly said.

They looked up and saw Mrs. Mc Coy. She looked angry at Sandrina and Hannah who looked a bit scared at her. She knew Mrs. Mc Coy hated teasing. Especially at somebody's size.

"Wait! They did't want to tease me. I... I asked them too." Nina said.

"You asked them too?" She asked with a strange look.

"Well i wanna be fat. So when others teased me I... liked it. But now everyone teases Hannah so... I missed being teased so I asked them if they could tease me a bit."

Hannah and Sandrina slowly nodded.

"We did't want to hurt her but just help her. Making her feel more happy." Sandrina said.

"Well... All right then i guess but do me a favor and don't do it with other people around. I might give them wrong ideas. Especially after what you did Hannah!" Mrs. Mc Coy said.

"Hey Fatso." A boy said too Hannah. Followed by an: "Au!" When one of Hannah's rubber band hit him.

"Hm He deserved it." Nina mumbled.

She felt a bit pressure and when she looked down she saw how her jeans cut a bit in her soft belly flesh. She hated it if her jeans were getting tight. She liked too notice it she got fatter but tight jeans hurt and left marks on her tummy. She also knew her mother would't be happy if she said she needed new clothes. Maybe she could buy some sweatpants this time.

"All right kids. You can do something for yourself until it's time." Mrs. Mc Coy said.

All kids went i different directions to get what they wanted to do. Hannah, Nina and Sandrina went to the reading corner what more or less had become their place since hardly any one else got here.

"So did you liked our teasing?" Sandrina asked.

"Well too be honest I did." Nina said and patted her round belly.

"Wow Nina you're really are getting fat." Hannah said while she pushed a finger in Nina's fat rolls.

"Hey stop it." Nina said with a giggle.

"Say i would like to read some more about those BBW model's. Could you get that magazine, Hannah?" Sandrina said.

Hannah took her backpack and careful so no one else would see it she took the magazine out of it. They put the magazine down so no one would see the cover and went reading it lying on their belly.
Nina must admit she really enjoyed this. She only worried about how her mother would react.
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Tease time

1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
The way Hannah sat down in her chair made her belly push out over the waistband of her pants. She found this mildly uncomfortable, and adjusted herself accordingly. After finding an equilibrium of sorts, she laid back down, and acknowledged her mother handing her a large plate full of sweets.

"Eat this all," her mother said before turning away.

"Uh, I'm kinda full. Would it be okay if I didn't eat it?" Hannah asked.

"Well, that depends," her mother said, turning around with a disappointed look in her eyes, "Did you listen when Nina said she was full?"

Hannah felt her stomach drop as she sighed, running a hand through her bangs. "No, no I didn't, but that was different."

"It was, you're right," her mother said, frowning even further, "She wasn't being punished for criminal activity."

"Criminal?" Hannah repeated. Those words had been repeated several time in the household since that incident, and, every time, Hannah felt the air drop to frigid temperatures as the warmth and joy was sucked into a black hole of darkness. Hannah wasn't a genius, far from it, but she knew what criminal activity meant. Robbers and murderers were criminals, and, if her parents were to be believed, so was she.

"Yes, kidnapping, assault, blackmail, fraud, torture, all of those are criminal offenses, and you, Hannah, committed every single one of them," her mother said, her voice growing louder and harsher with each syllable, "The only reason you aren't in jail is because of how old you are. Also, you're going to a therapist about all this once I find someone appropriate for your situation."

"But--I'm not a criminal!" Hannah stammered, eyes wide as she felt them well up in tears.

"Not now, but if we don't do something now, you would be," her mother said, a melancholy, mournful note in her symphony of fury.
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Serious punishment

1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
After class ended, the girls disbanded, leaving one another to return home. Nina saw Sandrina walk off to her mother, but Hannah stayed at Nina's side for a moment or two, her head lowered, eyes to the floor. Her cherubic face seemed tense, the softness filled with deep seated lines.

"Is something wrong?", asked a concerned Nina.

"Why aren't you hating me right now?" Hannah asked, her voice shaking slightly. "I kidnapped you. How can you just forgive me for that? I've been thinking a bit about that, and I'm starting to see something that I didn't see before..."

"Such as?"

"That I'm really just a dirty pig," Hannah replied, her eyes welling with tears, "I mean, you've just been so nice to me, and all I've done is hurt you and hate you. I've just been teasing you, locking you up, and yet, even now, you aren't running away, you're just standing here, encouraging me, making me feel good about myself. I'm just--just--" From then on, Hannah's words were muffled in her own sobs. She brushed away the tears on the back of her soft hands, her lips quivering. Nina placed a hand on her shoulder, and pulled her into her soft body. Hannah relaxed slightly as she fell into her friend's soft, plushy form.

"This feels good...", she cooed, still slightly depressed.
"Doesn't it?", Nina replied with a big smile.

After a few moments, Nina left Hannah alone to find her mother, the pudgy girl still crying to herself in self-loathing.
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: After school tomorrow...

1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
That evening, Hannah sat on the couch in front of the TV, eating the last of a large dinner in a state of depression. The TV was on the Weather channel, talking about an approaching storm which would hit sometime that week. Her mother was watching intently, so she would know how heavily to prepare.

Hannah took another bite of her cheeseburger, and chewed slowly. She had already eaten a large amount of food, so she was incredibly full. But she couldn't focus on her belly at the moment; her mind was preoccupied with the awful realization she had made, and with an unusual hatred towards herself. How could she be so selfish and stupid? She had treated Nina like trash, when she was trying to be her friend - even after Hannah had kidnapped the girl, locked her up in her attic, and tried to force-feed her until she couldn't move!
Hannah looked down at her belly, angry with herself and her actions. 'I deserve this,' she thought to herself. 'I should be fat...I should be treated the same way that I treated her...I...'
Scowling slightly, she forced herself to take another bite. Stuffed to the brim on one side, and full of self-loathing on the other, she pressed on, forcing herself to finish every single bite of her meal. Finally, after a few more minutes, she swallowed the last bite of her meal, and leaned back. She hiccuped slightly, feeling awful both in her belly and in her heart...

Suddenly, the phone rang, jolting Hannah out of her self-loathing. She glanced at the phone, only to turn away, figuring that the caller wanted to speak to her parents. She looked downwards, hateful emotions weling up against herself. Even her parents hated her. She deserved this hatred; that was how it had to be for a filthy, rotten girl like her. She didn't even have the energy to push herself up. She slumped forward, resting her palms on her ball-like stomach.

She was about to lay down when her mother, who had answered the phone, gestured over to her. "It's Nina," she replied coldly, holding the phone before the chubby little girl. "She wants to talk with you."
Hannah glumly accepted the phone, and said, slowly, "Hello?"

"Hey, Hannah," came a cheerful, pleasant reply. "What's going on?"

"Nothing. Uh, why did you call me?"

"I wanted to see how you were feeling. You seemed a bit down before, so I was a little worried."

"Down? I guess I am a bit down," Hannah replied, frowning still.

"Well, then I think I have a surprise that'll cheer you up!"

Hannah opened her eyes slightly more, interest showing. "What would that be?" she asked.

"I have a sleepover planned for tonight! I talked with your mom, and she said it was fine if you come over to my house tomorrow night after school! Yaaaay!!!"

Hannah chuckled slightly at Nina's hyperactive, silly tone. "Really?"
"Yeah! Check with your mom, if you don't believe it; but in any case, I was going to ask you. Would it make you feel better if I invited you over tomorrow?"

Hannah paused, thinking. Why would Nina let her sleep over with her? Hadn't she been the one who kidnapped her, and tried to stuff her like a turkey?! Still...she knew Nina wasn't one to lie...

"...ok," came the reply. Nina cheered on the other side. "Alright! I'll check with ya tomorrow, kay?"

Hannah agreed. Then she quickly added, "Um, Nina? Can you tell me something?"

"Sure, what's on your mind?"

"Am I a bad person? Be honest."

"Well, I'll admit some of the things you've done haven't been very nice, but a bad person? That's pushing it."

Hannah let those words sink in. She smiled, tears filling her eyes. "Thanks. Listen, I'll talk to you later. I don't think my mom wants me talking on the phone very long." Hannah hung up the phone, and darted up to her room. She plopped herself down on her bed, noticing that the mattress heaved slightly under her upon impact. She wanted to cry. There was someone who didn't hate her. Someone didn't think she was a monster.

...but why?
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Hannah received a phone call...

1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
Hannah's mother dropped off her daughter, and told her she would send some pajamas over to Nina's house for the sleepover. It just happened to be the end of the week, so that would hopefully mean a three-day sleepover with Nina.

Hannah went into the classroom, and was almost immediately assaulted with teases from other kids.

"Hey, lard-butt!"

"Look out! Here comes an elephant!"

"How'd you fit into those clothes, tubby?"

When Nina saw Hannah come up to her, she saw a look of hurt on the smaller girl's face. "Aw, what's wrong?" Nina asked, giving her former kidnapper a hug.

"...why?" came a quiet voice.

Nina let go, trying to look into Hannah's face, which was looking downwards from shame.
"Why are you being so nice to me?" Hannah asked, her voice slightly shaking. "After everything I've done..."

Nina hugged her again. "Hey, you have to learn to let go," she replied. "If you hold onto the past, you'll never grow up, and you'll end up miserable and alone. Sure, you kidnapped me and fed me like the fat little piggy I am (Nina flicked her hair in a manner meant to look silly), but you didn't actually hurt me any. In fact, I kinda liked that you did that for me."

Hannah looked up in shock at this. Nina was...glad?
"W-why?"

"Hey, I already told you, I'm trying to get fatter. You taking me to your house, and giving me all that delicious food...the only thing I didn't like was that you handcuffed me up there. If you had left out the handcuffs, things would've been fine! I enjoyed being fed!"

At that moment, Hannah looked like she was about to break down in front of Nina. But Nina quickly stopped her. "Hey. Normally, I'm all for letting out your emotions, but I don't think you'd want to cry in front of all these bozoes here, so...how about we all meet up during recess?"

Hannah blinked hard, and nodded excitedly.
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Tomorrow at school...

1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
Nothing special happened the rest of the day. Nina, Hannah, and of course Sandrina, were too busy to think what they could do at the sleepover.
During recess, the trio stayed in the reading corner, and of course Hannah got some insults. She thought she more or less deserved them so she didn't do anything about it.
Finally, the kids were waiting for Nina's mother would pick them up.

"I don't get why your mother allowed a sleepover. I thought she was angry at you." Sandrina said.

"Oh, well I called her mother, and since I was the same girl that was kidnapped, she decided that it was fine. Lucky for you is't it?" Nina said with a grin.

"You know Hannah, you've really gained weight. I can see your belly pushing against your clothes." Sandrina said.

Nina did't respond, since she saw her mother and ran over to her and hugged her. Then she pushed her ear to her mother's belly and listened.

"What are you doing?" Her mother asked.

"I wanna hear the baby!" Nina said excited.

"Nina, that baby isn't a baby yet. It's still just a few cells now. After three months, it's finally some kind of baby, and even then it will take some time until you're able to feel him or her moving, and I never heard you could hear a baby talking from inside the womb."

"I know that. I'm just impatient; I wanna meet my baby sister."

"It could also be a brother Nina."

"Or two, or both."

"Oh please, I hope not. Now go get your friends."

Hannah and Sandrina already walked over to Nina, and together they walked too the car.

"What was that about." Hannah asked.

"My mother is pregnant. After nine months, it'll get born. Then I'm gonna be the big sister."

"I'm sure you will be a great big sister." Hannah mumbled.

"You'll sure be really big. Or more really fat!" Sandrina said with a giggle, and softly patted Nina's belly, making Nina giggle happily.

Nina's mother sighed when she heard that. Even her friends liked her fat. She still was't fond of Nina's fat. When her daughter first told her she wanted to be fat her mother did't knew what she heard. She punished Nina several times for telling her she really wanted to be fat. She finally accepted it, but that didn't mean she liked it. At least she'd now have at least another child that hopefully would't wanna be fat. After all, Nina was in some points a good roll model.

"Mommy, what do we have for dinner?"

"Well, Hannah's mother told me that the food need to be greasy, so who wants KFC?"

"MEEEEE!!!" All three the girls shouted.

Nina loved KFC and she hardly could believe how much of it she had eaten the past time. First when Sandrina and Hannah wanted to fatten her up, the chicken chow down competition and her parents because her mother got pregnant and to make her feel better after they rescued her from Hannah and also sandrina's mother gave her some KFC last time they were there.

"You know they say you are what you eat, Nina. So why are't you a chicken?"

"Well I'm more of a pig, aren't I?"

All three girls started to laugh.
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Driving home

choices: Or skip to tonight, in the actual sleepover?
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
Nina entered the house, sweaty and breathing heavily. "Phew! Tired..." she said, immediately heading for the couch. Nina's mother shook her head with a sigh, while Sandrina giggled to herself, and dragged Hannah in by the wrist.
"You alright Nina?" asked Sandrina, placing her backpack on the floor against the wall. "You seem worn out, but you didn't do anything. You aren't becoming, um...immo-, immo - "

"-immobile?" Nina panted, earning a nod from Sandrina. "No, I can still move. It's the heat; I'm more used to cool temperatures."
"So that's why you like to hang outside in the Fall so much?"
"Uh-huh!"
"But wouldn't you go out in winter, if you like cold?" Hannah asked.
Nina chuckled in response. "Hannah, temperatures in winter get to below freezing. I like cool, not COLD."
Hannah chuckled also.
"Hey," Sandrina spoke up, "how about I get our rooms set up for tonight, Hannah? That way, we won't have to worry about it later, and we can stay up late!"
Hannah nodded, smiling softly. As Sandrina left upstairs, Hannah walked over to Nina, and knealt beside the reclined fat girl.

"...Nina?" she asked. Nina turned her head in response, a bright, warm smile on her face. "Yes, Hannah?"
"...I still...I..."Hannah tried to say it, but couldn't find the strength to speak. Nina put two plump fingers on hannah's lips, causing her to pause.
"It's alright," Nina said understandingly. "Don't worry, ok? Just try to relax, and enjoy yourself for now. Mommy's got a yummy dinner for us, and I'm sure you're hungry, even after lunch."

Hannah's chubby stomach grumbled and growled in agreement.

"See? Even your tummy says so," Nina added. She then grabbed the sides of hannah's tummy, and jiggled as she said, in a high, mimicing voice, "That's right, Hannah! My name is hungry belly, and you should stop worrying so much over the past! Also, I wanna eat food!"

Hannah laughed, and smiled at Nina's random, silly, but surprisingly good acting. She smiled, and nodded. "Ok. I won't worry about it."

"KIDS!" came a call from the kitchen, "TIME TO EAT!!!"
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Home at last..

1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
After several heavenly meals, the three girls were resting, spread out with their hands on their bellies. Sandrina had eaten a humane amount of food, but regardless of amount, was still stuffed. Hannah and Nina, naturally, had filled themselves to the breaking point with delicious food. They were moaning heavily as they drew close, clinging to Sandrina's arms for comfort, for whatever reason.

As though Sandrina could help them.

"Can you give us belly rubs?" Hannah groaned, her cheeks turning green and pale.

"Sorry. No idea how."

"You're no fun,"Nina moaned, sighing in her resignation as she rested her head on Sandrina's head, her thick cheeks pushing up against her chest, "So, Hannah,do you like this feeling?"

"Not really," answered the smaller girl, placing a tender hand on her tummy.

"Well, how about the food?" Nina queried, which Hannah put more thought into answering.

"I think I liked the food. I mean, if I didn't, why'd I stuff myself with it?"

"Eh, good point."
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Or skip to tonight, in the actual sleepover?

choices: Watch a movie/ play a game?
or maybe we skip to when they're asleep?
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
Hannah moaned softly as she lowered her rounded form onto the couch. It hurt, but not as much as before, since she had had time to digest.

"It's ok, Hannah," Nina answered, as she sat next to her. "You're still not used to dealing with a huge load, so you needed to rest and take it easy."
Hannah turned to the larger girl, and asked, "What about you? I took half an hour to not be full anymore, but you were ok after a few minutes..."
"Well, I'm used to being stuffed, so I can take being full," she said, resting her hand on her belly. "And might I point out that you really pushed yourself this time. You needed to let your belly digest all that food, so that you wouldn't feel so sick or weak."

Hannah nodded, and leaned against the soft, fat body next to her. Her fullness wasn't the only reason she was so weak; her depression also played a key role into it. She had pushed herself to eat more than usual, because as she felt herself get full, her self-hatred re-emerged. She felt like she had to punish herself for her crime. So, as punishmeant, she ate more than she thought she could handle. But no matter how much she stuffed...it wasn't enough...she still felt awful...

"...so what now?", she asked, a hint of sadness in her voice.
Nina smiled, and wrapped her arm around her friend. "Now," she answered, "we can do several things. Movie, game, jokes...whatever we want! It's Friday, and I vote we should enjoy it!"
"I agree!," Sandrina said. "And I suggest we watch something awesome, if it's a movie!"
Hannah allowed herself a slight smile, and thought about what they could do...
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: Continue the sleepover

choices: Cut to afterwards; Nina's mom wants her on a diet
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
The group had spent a large amount of time hanging out with one another, laughing as movies played before their little eyes, crying amongst themselves as their favorite characters suffered, and cheering when the inevitable moment of awesome realized itself on screen. However, almost as soon as the fun began, their bodies, warn down from excitement, began to wobble drunkenly as they approached their beds, ready for a long snooze.

Nina waited until the others were asleep, only to sneak off to the kitchen. The food they had eaten had been minimal compared to her usual amount, and she was starving. She filled her cheeks with juicy strips of chicken breast before sighing, resting her hands on every single piece of food in the refrigerator, hesitating for a moment before she stuffed herself to her gills.

She was getting fatter.

If she got too fat, she'd be immobile.

As much as she loved food, she already could feel the fat on her arms restricting her movements. The other girls could rest their arms alongside the side of their chests, but Nina's sides were far too thick to do anything like that. They just stuck out, held like a cowboy ready to draw out his gun. She was changing too quickly, and, as much as she liked it, she knew the threat it posed.

She didn't let her fears keep her from filling her belly up, though.

She needed an overly-stuffed belly to sustain her until breakfast.
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: or maybe we skip to when they're asleep?

choices: She goes to one of her friends
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
After her feast Nina went back to bed and did't woke up until next morning. The start of next day was fine for Nina. After she woke up she looked together with Sandrina and Hannah some early morning shows.
Nina looked up when her mother walked in and walked further to the kitchen. She heard her mother open the refrigerator and then some angry mumbling sounds.
Nina did't notice how angry her mother looked at her when she walked back. She returned about twenty minutes later with some breads from a shop. Sandrina and Hannah thought nothing of it. Nina knew that her mother would't be too happy with all the food she had eaten. But she had fun until Sandrina and Hannah were picked up by Hannah's mother. She waved her friends goodbye and walked back inside straight to the T.V

"Nina. can you come here please?" Her mother said.

"Sure." Nina said but when she saw her mother she got worried since she seemed very angry.

"Nina tonight someone emptied the entire refrigerator. Do you by any chance know who it might have been?" Her mother said sarcastic.

"Guess it was me. I got hungry tonight and wanted a little snack." Nina answered just as sarcastic.

"Seemed you also got even fatter. That's exactly the problem."

"Not that again." Nina answered while she rolled with her eyes.

"Nina I'm very serious this is going too far. You're getting way too fat."

Nina gulped. She noticed her mother seemed very angry. She also said TOO fat. She wondered what she mend by that. she knew a possibility but that was too worse for her too think about.

"Nina it's time we put you on a diet!"

"No! No! That's not fair. Why do you put me on a diet?"

"For your own good. Nina. You're slowly getting so fat it's getting unhealthy. If I let you go through with this ridiculous obsession of gaining weight Sou get serious health problems and you'll maybe become even immobile. So you stop now and lose weight."

"No! I don't care what you say! I've been over this a few times I don't wanna lose weight I wanna gain weight. I wanna be fat I wanna..."

"Nina that's it! You're going on a diet that's final. Later you will thank me for this!"

Nina rarely cried since she was smart enough to know that it mostly did't helped and she was't hurt when others insulted her but this was just too much for her and she started too cry. Very loud. Less then a minute later her father was in the room.

"What's going on here?" He asked.

"Mom wants to put me on a diet!" Nina said still crying.

"It's for your own good! I'm your mother and I decide what's best for you young lady. You gonna lose weight until you have the weight of a normal girl!"

"Don't you think you're going a little far. I mean you know she wants to gain weight. You agreed with that."

"No I did't agreed but she kept going on and on about it and would't stop so I decided to let her put on some weight hoping that crazy obsession of her would go away but like I said this is going too far. She's getting too fat. It's time to put an end to this."

Nina squinted with her eyes until they were just little cracks full of hate.

"I promise you... I...will... never... lose... weight!"

With that she ran out the front door still crying.
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.title: You're going on a diet

choices: Is angry seeing Nina's bloated belly
Is relieved that Nina is back home save and sound
1231111111222112112212111212121122111112.content:
Nina's eyes were so full of tears she did't noticed the person stand on their driveway until she bumped into her. She wiped her tears away and looked who it was.

"Easy Nina. Where's the fire?" A friendly old woman asked.

"Grandma!" Nina yelled excited. "Sorry I ran into you. I just had problems with my mom. Again. I was kind of sad."

Nina loved her grandmother (from her fathers side). She was one of the first persons she told her desire to gain weight. Her grandmother also supported her. Her grandmother always had food for her. Also soda filled with calories and when she stayed for a sleepover at her grandmother's house grandma always made fattening meals for her. Her grandmother also was still pretty fit for her age.
She lived alone after her husband died when Nina was two. She always loved it when Nina came to her. Sometimes she came to visit. Like now.

"Did't you mother told you I was coming to visit?" Her grandmother asked.

"No they did't." Nina said surprised and a bit annoyed her parents forget to tell her.

"I did't said a exact time when I would arrive, so why don't you and I go get something to eat?"

Nina's eyes sparkled and she nodded excited
Her grandmother drove straight to Mc Donalds. A few minutes later they were sitting at a table with three big macs, three super sized packs of fries, three milkshakes and three boxes of a dozen chicken Mc nuggets.
Nina fast started to eat.

"Now tell me Nina. You said you had problems with your mother. About what?"

"The same thing like always. My weight. She hates it. For some reason. She does't want me to become fat. After I emptied the fridge last night just because I had a midnight snack, she wanted me to go on a diet."

"A diet!" Her grandmother yelled. "You're way too young for a diet! You can put such young girls on a diet! This is going way too far! I will really need to talk to her! Too bad she's not my child. If she was she would probably listen to her mother. But your mother and I never were on the same page."

"Is't that in a lot of families?" Nina asked.

"Well... not in all but in a lot of families, yes! Say Nina are you really gonna eat all that? I don't mind at all, don't get me wrong but I would a bit surprised that all that food fits in your tummy."

123111112.content:
The first noise Nina was aware of when she awoke was a familiar, low, grumbling sound. She hadn't eaten in at least eight hours. So, she got up and walked downstairs quietly - there was still the chance her parents were still asleep, and she didn't want to wake them up just yet.

Nina entered the kitchen, and opened the fridge. Her parents had good jobs, and so their fridge and pantry were literally stuffed to the brim with food and drinks. She thought for a moment, and decided to pull a trick that she had read about online. She looked at the clock - 4:30 a.m.! That was plenty time.
She grabbed the bacon from the fridge, and cooked 15 slices - 4 each for her parents, and seven for her. Then, without cleaning the frying pan, she began cooking scrambled eggs. She had heard that with this process, the extra grease and fat left behind by the bacon would coat and mix with the egs, thus making them even more fattening. By this time, her parents had woken up. Dad walked into the kitchen and was caught off guard. "Nina? What are you doin'?" Nina left the eggs to cook, and sat down on a chair. "I was cooking breakfast, daddy. You were both asleep when I woke up, so I thought it'd be nice for me to cook something for you two, for a chane."
Her dad hugged her; "Aw, honey that's sweet of you! Thanks, Nina.", he said, hugging his chubby daughter tightly. Nina hugged back, and resumed cooking.

When the eggs were done, everyone ate a quick breakfast; Nina's dad intentionally gave a little of his portion to Nina, as a thank-you for cooking. She happily devoured all of hers and the bit her dad gave her. Nina's mom knew that her husband's feeding Nina more food wasn't helping her weight, but she let it go since Nina did deserve a thank-you for the meal. After the meal, Nina cleaned herself up (except for her hair; she liked it short, frazzled and messy just like it was), and headed off to school.

At school...

"Here you go. Some delicious spaghetti with sauce." Sheala said

"Thanks squirt. Hee sorry that you could't go to grandma but admit it's not so bad here either." Terra said

"I guess so. I'm glad we stay here."

"Well i was here before but that's long ago. You can't remember. You can swim here. There's a small lake and a playground maybe you can make some friends."

"Maybe." Sheala mumbled and smiled while Terra ate her spaghetti.
12411122222112.title: More food

choices: Do Aunt Paula and Sheala bring Terra up to her bedroom?
Or does Terra lay down on the couch, and get her tummy rubbed?
124111222221121.content:
Terra continued to snack and eat while she played. She was at a saving place, and had just finished a level. While Kirby was doing the little dance he always does after a level, Terra heard from the kitchen, "DINNER TIME!!!"

Terra waited until she reurned to the level-select menu, and saved her game. Then she stood up and started for the kitchen. As she stood up, she paused; she let out a small groan, as one hand subconciously went to her tummy. She figured that her tummy had adjusted while she was sitting down, so it'd re-adjust after dinner.
Terra's stummy was full of snacks; her tummy had a very small bulge to it, a sign that she had been eating alot. Sheala noticed, and smiled inwardly. Her plan was slowly working, and Terra wasn't suspecting anything.

Terra plopped down into a chair, and got herself set to eat. She had manners, despite her huge apetite; she put a napkin on her lap, to catch any crumbs, and was careful to avoid putting her elbows on the table. When Aunt Paula entered with the dinner plates and food, Terra's mouth dropped. There was so much delicious food! Turkey, burgers, macaroni and cheese, spaghetti - so much! She didn't notice herself drooling slightly, but Sheala and Aunt Paula saw. The sweet chubby lady chuckled, and playfully commented, "Looks like somebody's hungry!"

As they dug in, Terra got as much as she could. She practically [i]dove[/i] into the turkey, and started stuffing her face. Some grease was starting to get on her mouth, but she didn't mind. She was getting more bloated with each bite, but she was only focused on the food. Sheala smiled, watching her sister gorge herself. Aunt Paula was sure to set healthier food near Sheala, so she wouldn't get too unhealthy.

After she and Aunt Paula had finished the turkey, erra began on the burgers. She bit into the first one, and delicious juices and grease overwhelmed her. She ate more and more, fast filling her belly up. As she was doing this, Aunt Paula was also stuffing herself, but not as fast. She was taking time to enjoy each bite, and make sure Terra got more to eat.

After they had all stuffed themselves like...well, turkeys, Terra leaned back. Her belly was now very full, and it was doubtful whether she could stand up or not. Terra started to moan softly, and Aunt Paula and Sheala watched her. She was starting to get full, and they knew it. Sheala looked at Aunt Paula, as if asking [i]"can we have her eat more?"[/i]
Aunt Paula shook her head. Yes, Terra did need to get fatter. However, if they made her eat more, while she was still rather thin, her body might not be able to tolerate the total amount of food she was eating. Best to let her belly relax and digest her meal now, and then feed it later.
Sheala didn't know this, but she wouldn't argue with Aunt Paula's decision. She simply made a note to ask her later, when Terra was either asleep or out of the room.

Aunt Paula stood up, and rubbed her belly, walking over to Terra. "You ok, sweetheart?", she asked tenderly.
Terra looked up, pain in her eyes. "mm-hmm..."she moaned. Her belly stuck out slightly; since she was still skinny, her skin wouldn't be as stretchy as Aunt Paula's bloated belly. But for her size, she had eaten quite a bit.
124111222221121.title: Dinner!

choices: Follow aunt Paula and Sheala cook
1241112222211211.content:
"I believe you're very tired. It has been a long day for you. Maybe it's better if you go too bed."

"That's a... good... idea. Can you... help me... up please?"

Sheala and aunt Paula walked over too Terra and pulled her up. Terra was't that heavy but still more heavy then her little sister who could't help but think: "What a fat ass!" when she needed to pull her sister up.
She followed her aunt and sister who went too her sister's bedroom.
Terra picked up her Nightie and looked at her aunt and sister.

"Can i have some privacy?"

They fast closed the door. They heard Terra mumbling while she changed and then her crawling under the blanket. Then it was quiet.
Sheala and aunt Paula walked downstairs trying not too make any sound.

"So the fatty is asleep."

"Well she is't fat yet. But she can really use some extra fat. You right she's underweight. I can almost see her bones."

"Well we will help her plump up a bit. Then maybe she'll look like you!"

"Oh my gosh. Do you really think she wants to look like me?"

"Nah not really. However she would like to have your boobs!"

Aunt Paula had big boobs while Terra only had small lumps. She hated that. Soon she would start high school and did't want to be known like the flat chested girl. She really hoped her boobs would grow in the vacation.

"When are we gonna feed her again?" Sheala asked.

"Well i will make some things for breakfast. After she wakes up we can feed her. She first needs to digest her food from today so it can turn into fat."

Sheala grinned to herself. Finally she could get her sister back. After all those years. Always be the little sister, the squirt the half pined, the dwarf. She was used to those nicknames but she still did't liked them. Terra made them up. She liked this plan too fatten her sister up. There was only own thing she did't liked. That she needed to lie too aunt Paula. She would rather tell her the truth but she did't think her aunt would be fine too fatten ah girl just for revenge.

"I really like it to finally get too know you girls. I should come over more often."

"If you do that can you also cook for us?" Sheala asked.

Even without the fat it tasted good. So good Sheala even licked her plate clean.

"You also like my cooking i see. I'm glad. You know it's no fun too be good in something if no one's there to tell you. Well let's start for breakfast. Hey Sheala do you want to learn how too cook?"

Sheala looked up. Her mom never let her help too cook. The knifes,oven and the cooker. It was all much too dangerous for little kids. At least that's what she thought. But it liked her fun too help her aunt.

"Eh is it dangerous?"

"No not if your careful and else i will do it."

With a happy smile they started.
1241112222211211.title: What do we do now?

12411122222112112.content:
Terra was dead to the world asleep. She had remained in the same spot since she fell asleep; she couldn' turn on her side, because her tummy was too full. Her arms were splayed out, one arm raised up next to her head, the other on the covers.

Terra's sleep was disturbed by the loud blaring of the alarm clock in her room. She groggily turned over, and slapped the top of the clock, putting it asleep. She half-opened her eyes, and looked at the time.
6:45 a.m.
She groaned softly, as she crawled back under the covers and returned to sleep.

After a few minutes, the alarm rang again. This time, Terra sat up and turned off the alarm altogether. She rubbed her eyes; she knew that nobody usually got up at this time, so it was a good way t get a jump-start on her morning. The sooner she got up, she believed, the sooner she could play video games.

Terra went into the bathroom to try and wake herself up before getting breakfast. after she splashed some water in her face, she went downstairs to get some food.

Terra stumbled downstairs, which woke Sheala up. She realized that her sister must've woken up, and couldn't wait to see what happened. She half expected to be greeted by a chubby, fattened Terra, gorging herself on breakfast.
When she got downstairs, she was greeted by the same-size Terra she had always known. Guess Terra's not the only one who's still drowsy, eh?
Terra had a big grin on her face; laid out before her was a huge breakfast, still fresh and warm. Sheala smiled; Aunt Paula must've been up late making his big dinner for Terra. Her suspicions were true, as Aunt Paula was snoring softly in her bedroom upstairs.

Sheala looked her sister over, hoping to see some change.
Her hair was a mess, which was usual this time of day. But what she noticed was lower; Terra's usually scrawny arms and belly were slightly bigger. She now had a slightly thicker frame, with slightly bigger thighs and rear. Her chest was still flat (since she was still too young to get those), but the rest of her had definitly grown. Now, instead of looking like a twig, she looked like an average girl.

Sheala smiled, and asked, "So? Ya hungry?"
Terra nodded, now wide awake at the sight of pork sausages, scrambled eggs, bacon, and a myriad of other breakfast delights. Sheala noticed a note on one edge of the table. It read,
"Sheala, here's the breakfast. Everything on the table is for your sister; your breakfast is in the fridge. Please make sure she eats it all! A
- Aunt Paula"

Terra asked, "Hey, what's that?" Sheala thought fast, and crumpled up the note. "It's a note from Aunt Paula. She says there's milk and juice n the fridge.", she answered, throwing the note away.
Terra shrugged, and sat down to eat.
12411122222112112.title: Day 2 of the three-week vacation

124111222221121121.content:
Sheala slowly walked too the fridge but could hardly keep her eyes of Terra. She could't belive the toothpick-sized girl that her sister used to be now changed in a greedy pig, or a food vacuum cleaner. She opened the fridge and found a plate with a note attached too it that said: for Sheala. She took it and walked back too the table and started eating her own breakfast.

"Better her then with our grandparents. Right?", asked Terra.

"For you it is. I like my grandparents. The're always nice too me. They also have those rooms full of junk were you can find neat stuff. Remember that we found that indian tent in a coner behind a curtain and played in it, or else those..."

"It's fun for you. If you did't want to also play in that indian tent i would't be allowed too play in it. You know that!" She said and stuffed almost an entire sausage in her mouth.

Sheala opened her mouth to say something about it before she thought she must admit it was true. Their grandma really hated Terra. She still did't understand why. Terra was't really a brat. Sure she was't a angel, and of course she and Terra fought every now and then, but they were sisters. They were supposed to fight now and then. Why was it that grandma hated Terra? Terra of course was few years older. Maybe something happened before she was born or when she was so young she could't remember, she wondered. Terra always said she did't knew why. Maybe she did't remember it also or did't want to talk about it. It could also be grandma just did't liked her - "Hate at first sight", or something like that.

"All right. I knew you would have had a terrible time with our grandparents. But she also makes those delicious chocolate pancakes."

"Only for you. I only get one if you're not able too finish them." She pushed her mouth full with bacon. "Besides *chew chew* don't tell me *chew chew* you don't *chew chew* like it here. BUUUURRRRP!!!"

"Well i'm only here for a day, but until now I must admit it was't bad. Today I think I'm going outside. I bet you're just gonna keep sitting on your fat butt playing computer games!"

"My butt is not fat! When I was your age, my butt was smaller then yours! So who's the fat one now?", Terra said.

Sheala knew that if she kept saying things about eating or gaining, she could make Terra realize how much she was eating. So she held her mouth shut and eat her breakfast. But she kept looking at Terra.
One would've almost thought the girl did't get any food at home. She stuffed herself with all the food for breakfast - that would be enough fot five people. Sheala almost could't belive how much her sister ate; she did't leave a single crumb. All the food ended up in Terra's now bloated belly.

After that Terra went too the TV.
Sheala walked over too the refrigerator. It was full of snacks that she and aunt Paula made. She knew that Terra would get the snacks herself when she got hungry.
She thought about going outside, but on the other hand it would't take long until it was time for lunch. Of course she could just sport a bit more in the training room, or read a book...

"Hmmm. What will i do?", the little girl thought.
124111222221121121.title: First breakfast

124111222221122.content:
Terra laid back after filling her stomach with food, sighing as she patted her extended belly after the three plates of pasta past through her lips, down her throat, and into her belly. She felt the sensation of the food pushing against the inside of her skin as she moaned, gently. "Aunt Paula, this is just delicious! I can't believe you used oyster meat, though. Didn't think that would work very well..."

Sheela glanced at her sister, a grin spreading across her own semi-cherubic face. For the past five days, Terra had been fed by their aunt, bombarded with cookies, dishes of foreign cuisine, dark meats and exotic vegetables, all sizzling in the most fattening of juices, dozed in the thickest of sauces, and prepared by oen of the best chefs to ever feed the two of them. As Terra sat on her lazy, slowly thickening derriere playing her video games, she had begun to fatten up into the butterball that she had to become by the time the vacation reached its end.

Sheela wasn't sure if her older sister even noticed this metamorphosis. All she saw was her sister eating the food that Aunt Paula and herself produced. Sheela was learning from that great cook herself, after all, and she was learning all sorts of special recipes, testing a few of her dishes out herself...and on Terra.

After all these days, Terra was...
124111222221122.title: Some days forward

choices: "Are you sure you're full?  You're not hungry for more?"
1241112222211222.content:
Sheela frowned slightly in dissapointment.
Sure, her sister had fattened up some since they had first began the three-week vacation. She looked like a regular-sized "plump" girl her age; her normally thin arms and legs had filled out to fit normal-sized clothes. She did have a pot belly, which looked bigger simply because she had eaten so much. Her face had filled in more, so she looked more healthy. She even looked slightly younger, as if she was about a year or so younger than she really was! So she had fattened up...

...but...it wasn't enough...

Sheela wanted to make her sister FAT, not just curvier. She wanted her sister to be fat on ordinary standards - a girl with chunky, jelly-like thighs, and a big, round belly with rolls of fat. She wanted Terra fat, and she was getting somewhat impatient.
"Sure she's definitely gained weight," she thought quietly to herself, "but it's not enough. If I want to convince Mommy and Daddy that she's too spoiled, then I need her to look like she's spoiled. She's got to be FAT, and we only have two weeks left to get her that size!"

Terra didn't notice her sister mumbling to herself in the corner. She simply let her huge meal settle inside her, letting her thoughts drift and her body to relax. She had eaten quite alot today, and all she was focusingon was finishing up the boss level. The giant squid had bested her four times now, and she neded a new strategy to defeat it.

"Aunt Paula?" Terra asked a few minutes after her dinner began settling, "May I be excused?"

Aunt Paula looked towards Terra, looking innocently at the older woman, and replied...
1241112222211222.title: ....not as big as she could be...

choices: Sheela forces Terra to eat her cooking.

12411122222112221.content:
Terra smiled as she walked off, plopping herself down on the nearest sofa with her hand held, her thumbs moving rapidly over the buttons as she gnawed on her tongue, eyes focused, sweat beading up on her forehead. Sheela glanced over at her, frowning, before turning to Aunt Paula, her face set in a minor scowl. "Hey, are you sure she's eaten enough? I'm pretty sure there's a few crumbs on her plate she can--"

Aunt Paula glanced at Sheela as she tucked a rogue lock of dark hair behind her ear. She smiled, patiently, as she guided the young girl into a corner so they could be more private. In actuality, all this did was make them more suspicious, but Terra was too preoccupied to notice. "Sheela, Terra's gotten a bit thicker in the past few days. We don't want to turn her into a cow just yet. Girls her age are very concerned with their appearance, and we want this to be gradual so she doesn't, I dunno, spiral into a cycle of self-hate or something. You understand, don't you?"

Sheela honestly understood, and, despite her wanting Terra to be a cow, she didn't want her to be suicidally depressed either. Besides, what fun would it be if the game went without a hitch. There were other ways of ensuring her sister fattened up...
12411122222112221.title: "Sure, Terra!"

1242.content:
Twenty-three minutes.

Amy wiped some drops of sweat from her brow as she bite once more into the burger. She was starting to reach her limit, but the four pairs of eyes watching her intently as she swallowed urged her on. She took another bite, crumbs and meat juice clinging to her mouth.
If she knew she would've been eating his much, she wouldn't have taken Mark's bet. Claiming she couldn't force down 3 super-sized cheeseburgers would've been a fair enough remark, but dropping a double-dog dare...she had to! NOBODY turned down a double-dog dare!

That was 23 minutes ago... and now she was starting to regret taking that dare.

"C'mon, Amy," Rich cheered quietly. "You can do it, you've come this far already!"
Amy took a deep breath, and with all her remaining strength, she forced the remaining morsel down her throat and promptly leaned back, hands on her bloated body. She let out a soft moan as the numb pain of all that meat and bread pushing her insides washed over her.

"She did it!", Charlie cheered out loud, earning a 'Whoop!' from Rich and Jeff. Mark groaned at having lost his bet, but sighed. Now he had TWO weeks worth of homework to do.

Cathy used to have a good life, she had loving parents, she was a good student and had plenty of friends. But all that change when she was 7 years old. That was the year her father walked out of her life. Her mother was completely devastated by this, all she would do for a while was sleep on the couch and watch television.

Until one day when Cathy woke in the basement and she was tied to a chair. Her mother then came down and she brought a tray full of food. She explained how she was afraid that her daughter would one day move away and leave her all alone so she decided to fatten her up to the point of immobility so she could never move. Cathy's mom would spent all day and night feeding Cathy no matter how much she begged her to stop only going outside to get groceries. Even when Cathy's stomach would hurt from being full her mother would feed her anyway.

This went on for weeks and whenever someone would ask about Cathy's whereabouts her mother would just say that she was sick and she needed rest. Then one day a friend of Cathy a human boy named Troy went to her house to check up on her. When he knocked on the door Cathy's mom simply told him to go away and let her daughter rest, as he was leaving he heard groans coming from the basement widow he got suspicious and decided to wait until Cathy's mom would leave the house.

After a few hours of waiting Cathy's mom left the house to do groceries luckily for him she forgot to lock the door. When he entered the house he went straight to the basement where he heard the groans and he was shocked about what he saw. He saw his best friend tied to a chair and fat. He asked her what happened and she told him that her mother went crazy and started fattening her up. Troy decided to go to his dad who was the chief of police and they arrived at her house and arrested Cathy's mom who was committed to a mental asylum.

After that Troy's family took Cathy in and she has been living with them for six years and has been gaining weight do to her large appetite.

Where do we find Cathy now?

144.content:
Valko grinned as he leaned back on the nice soft beach towel. He looked around the beach to see who else was near by him. He sighed as his eye’s returned the unpleasing answer to him. He could only spot a few adults and one other boy around the age of 3 or so.

Valko had “staked out” this spot on the local public beach for almost 2 weeks now, ever since school had let out. He loved lying on his towel and showing off his body to everyone around him, especially the girl’s his age. It might seem strange for a 9 year old fox cub to be doing such things, but he wasn’t the type of boy that went “eewww” at the idea of having a girlfriend. True, his thoughts were innocent and he was thinking of nothing more than a puppy love relationship, but he still liked the idea of having a nice big girl to love.

He blushed at that thought. He didn’t know why, but he had always preferred a girl who was more on the “plump” side and actually kinda liked seeing a girl eat and get fatter. He wasn’t sure if this was so normal, seeing how ALL girls must want to be skinny and ALL boys had to like them that way, or at least that’s what T.V and movies told him. However, he couldn’t help what he liked.

He was sure he’d find someone soon too. Not only had he been at this spot, although mostly for his love of the beach not just his want of a puppy love crush, but also because he had a pretty firm and fit body…had being the operative word. Since he was coming to the beach so often, he didn’t really do that much anymore outside of lay on his towel. It also didn’t help that a number of venders, including a fried chicken place, had opened up only a short jaunt from where the little 9 year old liked to lay. Worse yet, but he the little fox kid always was given lots of money by his parents, who were thankful to have a nice quite house all to themselves. All of this had caused his once “abded” belly to become softer and even begin to form a bit of a plump pot. Valko was unaware of this himself, which was why he continued to eat down the nice big bucket of chicken he had just bought.

However, the cute plump 9 year old girl walking down the beach wasn’t so unaware of him, or his food.

She quickly…

Valko decided to just walk up and say hi to her.

The girl jumped slightly and dropped her bucket of ice cream since she didn't hear him coming.

Upon closer inspection Valko also noticed that Maddy was probably his age give or take a few months. She also has white fur, waist length dark brown hair and her beautiful eyes were two different colours, with one blue and the other green.

"I don't remember seeing you around. Are you new around here?" asked Valko.

"Not exactly. You see I've been home schooled most of my life until I wanted to go too school and I asked my parents if I could go to school and they said yes so I'll start school when the summer is over. That and I don't go outside much" said Maddy as she ate her ice cream.

"How come?" asked Valko.

"I don't have any friends aside from my cousins but they live far away. So I pretty much spent all day eating which is how I got all this" said Maddy while patting her belly to emphasize her obesity. "Whenever I would go outside and try too make friends the other kids would call me fat and ugly, so because of this fat I don't have a single friend in the world" said Maddy but this time she starting to tear up.

Valko noticed this and spoke up.

14431122121.content:
Valko arrived at his house and entered and he immediately saw his parents in front of him. His dad (named Bill) was an average size guy with horn-rimmed glasses and his mom (named Mary) was a bit on the plump size and they did not look happy.

"Do you have any idea what time it is!?" said Bill.

"Sorry dad I was hanging out with some friends at the beach and time just flew by" said Valko.

"Honestly Valko we seriously need to get you a watch" said Mary.

"Well at least you're in time for dinner but next time if your this late again we're banning you from that beach permanently, understand?" said Bill.

"Yes dad" said Valko as he and his parents made their way to the kitchen and ate their dinner.

"So did you have fun with Lisa?" asked Mary.

"Yeah but not just with Lisa, I met another girl named Maddy" said Valko.

"Oh? Is she nice?" asked Mary.

"Yeah she is. In fact she even invited me to her birthday party, do you think I can go?" said Valko.

"That depends, what are her parents like?" asked Bill. The reason he asked that is because the friends Valko has is because his parents believe if a kid has good parents then he can be friends with Valko.

"I don't know I haven't met them, but I have her phone number if you want to talk to them" said Valko.

After dinner Mary got on the phone and called Maddy's house. After a few minutes she came to Valko's room while he was getting ready for bed.

"I called Maddy's parents and invited them for dinner tomorrow, okay?" said Mary.

"Okay mom" said Valko. He really hoped that his parents would like Maddy's parents since he really wanted to hang out with her more often.

info.brief_description: What the title implies.  It's another WG story involving teens, anthros, and kids.
info.description:
This is just another weight gain story. Decide how certain children and teenagers, both human and/or anthro, gain weight and get bigger.

First, some rules:
Don't add about magic, demons, curses, or unrealistic gains (ex. No gaining 50 pounds from eating one burger and fries)
Try to keep it realistic.

Immobility is allowed, but try keeping it at a minimum? I've noticed folks tend to go overboard on that.

Don't kill the main character off, please.

Romance is fine, but No sexual or nude stuff either. Keep it clean, kay?

Secondly, magic and any weight gain over 800 lbs isn't allowed.

Vore's allowed on anthro characters only, so no "human eats ____" stuff, ok?

Finally, try to add at least one other option when adding a new character, ok? That way others can add characters, too. ^^
Also, if you wanna add a new character or end a storyline, check with me first, ok? Send me a PM asking me about it, and if you're adding a new character, please add a description of the new person?

Please add, and have fun everyone!
